story:
Quick and easy to use

Share images with your client

Cross check of diagnosis

Educational tool

Improves access to preventative care

Early detection for timely intervention

Artificial intelligence for diagnostic support

Compatible with our existing hearing test devices

A smartphone otoscope for accurate diagnosis of ear disease with artificial intelligence

330 million people suffer from ear disease every year - most are children and unable to access accurate diagnosis for treatment.

hearScope - a revolutionary otoscope - significantly improves and alters access to preventative ear care.

 

 

 

Ear infection is one of the most common reasons why kids see a doctor and one of the main causes of hearing loss. If ear disease is not correctly diagnosed early, it can cause permanent hearing loss and even death. A shortage of health providers who can accurately diagnose ear disease is a major reason for these complications. 

    To give the world an affordable, user-friendly health care solution that anyone can use as an assistive tool in the diagnosis of ear disease. Our vision is that parents will also be able to capture an image of their child’s eardrum using hearScope. 

     

    hearScope's camera and optics allow high-quality video and image footage of the eardrum.

     

    We are dedicated to ensuring that anybody can use our solution and that all the technical requirements are met.

    Our aim was to have a simple, but functional design, that is compatible with smartphones. We started with a smartphone cover, but soon realized we needed an external device with its own light source and focus. We had to think of every detail of the shape, size, positioning, brightness and focal options. Through many iterations as well as feedback from experts and laypersons we finally aligned the design with our vision of ear health for everyone, everywhere.

    A lightweight pen-shaped camera that ensures consistent lighting, exceptional focus and compatibility with most Android smartphones.

     

    Promising to revolutionize access to ear care, award-winning hearScope has been developed by the hearX Group who specializes in providing world-first digital hearing health solutions. 

    View hearScope images in the cloud on any computer connected to the internet. Share images with patients and colleagues. 

    A clear view so you can make a more accurate diagnosis. 

    You can now show your patient/parent what you’re seeing during and after examination. 

    Variable magnification (1x – 200x). Zoom like never before – detail matters!

    High-quality videos offer an unprecedented opportunity to store ear conditions for visual reference (not to mention the academic benefits!) 

     

    Multiple specula included. Convenient range of specula included to fit ears of all sizes (ships with 2x 2mm; 2x 3mm; 2x 4mm).

    We've successfully developed an Artificial Intelligence Neural Network focused on the diagnosis of outer and middle ear diseases. Our published research has shown that the image-analysis software and artificial intelligence systems are capable of diagnosing these diseases with  above 80% accuracy. Our accuracy is similar to that of family doctors.

    The user-friendly application means anyone, anywhere in the world, can record images on a mobile phone and upload it to the automated diagnosis system. 

    By backing our campaign – you will help us to get the AI diagnosis ‘market ready’ and you will be the first to experience its benefits! Everyone that buys a hearScope through this campaign will receive a month’s free subscription to the automated AI diagnosis service as soon as it goes live.

    Users are able to easily take images or videos of a person’s eardrum. The recorded media is then attached to a record and uploaded into the mHealth Studio Cloud data management system. The application provides two options for external image diagnosis, namely:

    1. Specialist Diagnosis

    The image is sent to an ear specialist partner for a manual diagnosis. The specialist makes the diagnosis and the user is notified in their app’s mailbox. This diagnosis is visible from the cloud.

    2. Diagnostic AI Support

    Our Artificial Intelligence Neural Network classifies images into one of the five most common diagnostic groups. Our diagnostic accuracy compares favourably with that of family doctors.

    You can have an impact - one ear at a time!

    To back the hearScope crowdfunding initiative would mean that YOU become a partner who will be directly involved in the pivotal aspect of enabling this solution to reach the people that need it most. One of the benefits of backing the campaign is, therefore, the opportunity to have a significant social impact by providing people with access to ear and hearing health care.

    You can be part of the future of health care by helping us achieve our vision of ear and hearing health for everyone, everywhere by signing up for one of our perks!

    Prof. Swanepoel has >16 years of experience in hearing research with an interest in early identification systems,  diagnostic techniques and ear and hearing telehealth. His primary affiliation has been with the University of Pretoria, South Africa but he also holds adjunct positions at the School of Behavioral & Brain Sciences, University of Texas at Dallas and Ear Sciences Centre, School of Surgery, University of Western Australia and the Ear Science Institute Australia.

    Nic Klopper is a world class CEO, serial entrepreneur and start­up investor. He has founded 7 successful business and exited 3 of them to date. He is currently the CEO and shareholder of hearX Group.

    Dr. Herman Myburgh graduated in 2008 as a Computer Engineer from the University of Pretoria. In 2009 he completed his Master’s degree in Electronic engineering at the same institution and graduated in 2010 with specialization in wireless communication system. In 2013 he received his PhD in Computer engineering, also from the University of Pretoria.

    David Howe is our lead mobile developer. Informally known as "Kernel Android", he has been with the team since its founding days. David oversees all mobile development at hearX from concept to roll-out. He holds a B.Eng degree in Computer Engineering from the University of Pretoria and has a keen interest in emerging technologies.

story_txt:
Quick and easy to use
Share images with your client
Cross check of diagnosis
Educational tool
Improves access to preventative care
Early detection for timely intervention
Artificial intelligence for diagnostic support
Compatible with our existing hearing test devices

A smartphone otoscope for accurate diagnosis of ear disease with artificial intelligence
330 million people suffer from ear disease every year - most are children and unable to access accurate diagnosis for treatment.
hearScope - a revolutionary otoscope - significantly improves and alters access to preventative ear care.
 

 
 

Ear infection is one of the most common reasons why kids see a doctor and one of the main causes of hearing loss. If ear disease is not correctly diagnosed early, it can cause permanent hearing loss and even death. A shortage of health providers who can accurately diagnose ear disease is a major reason for these complications. 






To give the world an affordable, user-friendly health care solution that anyone can use as an assistive tool in the diagnosis of ear disease. Our vision is that parents will also be able to capture an image of their child’s eardrum using hearScope. 

 
hearScope's camera and optics allow high-quality video and image footage of the eardrum.

 
We are dedicated to ensuring that anybody can use our solution and that all the technical requirements are met.

Our aim was to have a simple, but functional design, that is compatible with smartphones. We started with a smartphone cover, but soon realized we needed an external device with its own light source and focus. We had to think of every detail of the shape, size, positioning, brightness and focal options. Through many iterations as well as feedback from experts and laypersons we finally aligned the design with our vision of ear health for everyone, everywhere.

A lightweight pen-shaped camera that ensures consistent lighting, exceptional focus and compatibility with most Android smartphones.







 

Promising to revolutionize access to ear care, award-winning hearScope has been developed by the hearX Group who specializes in providing world-first digital hearing health solutions. 

View hearScope images in the cloud on any computer connected to the internet. Share images with patients and colleagues. 

A clear view so you can make a more accurate diagnosis. 
You can now show your patient/parent what you’re seeing during and after examination. 
Variable magnification (1x – 200x). Zoom like never before – detail matters!

High-quality videos offer an unprecedented opportunity to store ear conditions for visual reference (not to mention the academic benefits!) 

 
Multiple specula included. Convenient range of specula included to fit ears of all sizes (ships with 2x 2mm; 2x 3mm; 2x 4mm).



We've successfully developed an Artificial Intelligence Neural Network focused on the diagnosis of outer and middle ear diseases. Our published research has shown that the image-analysis software and artificial intelligence systems are capable of diagnosing these diseases with  above 80% accuracy. Our accuracy is similar to that of family doctors.
The user-friendly application means anyone, anywhere in the world, can record images on a mobile phone and upload it to the automated diagnosis system. 
By backing our campaign – you will help us to get the AI diagnosis ‘market ready’ and you will be the first to experience its benefits! Everyone that buys a hearScope through this campaign will receive a month’s free subscription to the automated AI diagnosis service as soon as it goes live.


Users are able to easily take images or videos of a person’s eardrum. The recorded media is then attached to a record and uploaded into the mHealth Studio Cloud data management system. The application provides two options for external image diagnosis, namely:
1. Specialist Diagnosis
The image is sent to an ear specialist partner for a manual diagnosis. The specialist makes the diagnosis and the user is notified in their app’s mailbox. This diagnosis is visible from the cloud.
2. Diagnostic AI Support
Our Artificial Intelligence Neural Network classifies images into one of the five most common diagnostic groups. Our diagnostic accuracy compares favourably with that of family doctors.

You can have an impact - one ear at a time!
To back the hearScope crowdfunding initiative would mean that YOU become a partner who will be directly involved in the pivotal aspect of enabling this solution to reach the people that need it most. One of the benefits of backing the campaign is, therefore, the opportunity to have a significant social impact by providing people with access to ear and hearing health care.










You can be part of the future of health care by helping us achieve our vision of ear and hearing health for everyone, everywhere by signing up for one of our perks!


Prof. Swanepoel has >16 years of experience in hearing research with an interest in early identification systems,  diagnostic techniques and ear and hearing telehealth. His primary affiliation has been with the University of Pretoria, South Africa but he also holds adjunct positions at the School of Behavioral & Brain Sciences, University of Texas at Dallas and Ear Sciences Centre, School of Surgery, University of Western Australia and the Ear Science Institute Australia.

Nic Klopper is a world class CEO, serial entrepreneur and start­up investor. He has founded 7 successful business and exited 3 of them to date. He is currently the CEO and shareholder of hearX Group.

Dr. Herman Myburgh graduated in 2008 as a Computer Engineer from the University of Pretoria. In 2009 he completed his Master’s degree in Electronic engineering at the same institution and graduated in 2010 with specialization in wireless communication system. In 2013 he received his PhD in Computer engineering, also from the University of Pretoria.

David Howe is our lead mobile developer. Informally known as "Kernel Android", he has been with the team since its founding days. David oversees all mobile development at hearX from concept to roll-out. He holds a B.Eng degree in Computer Engineering from the University of Pretoria and has a keen interest in emerging technologies.

1x hearScope
1x Protective carry case
1x Micro USB port cable
6x Specula (2x 2mm; 2x 3mm; 2x 4mm)
Instructions on how to use the hearScope and to download the software.

*Please note:  Only the ‘BUNDLE Deal’ will include a smartphone (Xiaomi)

story:
Hi, My name is Lukas, 

(Please see perks at bottom of story page of free holiday accommodation at my South African bush cottage for 7 days with each $750USD, $1000USD and $2000USD contribution, irrespective of achieving my goal, you will receive a free holiday)

I NEED YOUR HELP !!!!

I am a 61 year old disabled (person) pensioner that suffered 6 heart attacks and 2 major heart operations between 2005 and 2010. I have heart failure, long failure, diabetes and I also have neuropathy in my legs and feet, I walk with difficulty. 

I am staying in South Africa on the Border of the renowned Kruger National Game Reserve in a wildlife conservation park. (Marloth Park)

My wife Vernesse and I managed to start a Bush Cottage Guest house to support my disability income. You can view pictures of my safari bush cottage on the gallery page. 

However with my daily disability needs, medication and medical expenses growing every day I have realized that there are thousands of disabled and elderly people worldwide that cannot afford a holiday in the African bush among wild roaming animals nor do they have the opportunity to visit the Kruger National Game Reserve once in their lifetime. Realizing my needs as a disabled (person) pensioner I am in urgent need of funds to upgrade and refurnish my present bush cottage to accommodate disabled and elderly persons, making the accommodation wheelchair friendly, upgrading toilet and shower facilities, air conditioning, entertainment, transport, Splash Pool and a Professional overhaul of our website etc. We also want to acquire a game viewing vehicle with the necessary modifications to handle the disabled and elderly . 

( example of game viewing vehicle here below ) 

Most of the disabled and elderly person’s family members are normal healthy people seeking accommodation and accompanying their disabled family member or friend. I have in the past regrettably declined most bookings where disabled people were involved due to the fact that my bush cottage is not wheelchair friendly for disabled persons.

I desperately need contributions (funds) to start with the major upgrading and refurnishing of my bush cottage and I should be able to start upgrading the facilities early 2015 and appoint additional staff to assist our disabled and elderly guests.

I am really depending on contributions (funds) (help) from people of all walks of life worldwide to help me as a disabled (person) pensioner to accomplish my goal and helping disabled and elderly people to experience the South African wildlife once in their lifetime. ( please see gallery page )

PLEASE SEE YOUR FREE SOUTH AFRICAN WILDLIFE HOLIDAY ACCOMMODATION INFO AT BOTTOM OF THIS PAGE FOR 750USD, 1000USD AND 2000USD CONTRIBUTION (irrespective of achieving my goal) 

THE RELEVANT ASSOCIATED "PERKS" SECTION.

YOU WILL RECEIVE THE PERKS MENTIONED BELOW AT YOUR SHIPPING/POSTAL ADDRESS WITHIN 1-2 WEEKS AFTER YOUR CONTRIBUTION HAS BEEN RECEIVED.

PICTURE GALLERY OF T-SHIRTS, CUPS/ MUGS, LADIES HANDBAGS, WILDLIFE BOOKS, WILDLIFE CALENDERS, SAFARI BUSH HAT AND PLACE MATS. (AS PER YOUR CONTRIBUTION AMOUNT )

Kruger National Park Game Reserve  “Big Five” T-Shirts 

 

A South African wildlife calendar 2015

A South African wildlife book

Big Five Mugs/Cups

Safari bush hat

Big Five Tray and coasters

Big Five place-mats and coasters

Ladies handbag


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A Contribution of 750USD includes: (irrespective of achieving my goal, you will receive a free holiday)

  • A FREE one (1) week seven (7) day six (6) nights accommodation for two (2) persons to visit my bush cottage for a South African wildlife experience. (Airfare to and from South Africa for your own account)

Included: is a pick up and drop off shuttle service from Nelspruit Mpumalanga international airport to the bush cottage, a full one day game drive for two (2) persons on an open game viewer vehicle in the renowned Kruger National Game Reserve, viewing the Big Five: Lion, Elephant, Leopard, Buffalo and Rhino. Breakfast and dinner included. Also one South African traditional meal prepared and served by my wife (Vernesse) and myself (Lukas) under the beautiful South African evening sky. One game drive and sundowner picnic in the conservation area along the Crocodile River bordering the Kruger National Game Reserve. 

  • (TO BE BOOKED AND FINALIZED ASAP FOR 2015)

There will be ample enough time for leisure, like feeding wild roaming animals and observing birdlife at the cottage.



Full Details and Description of the $1000 Elephant Perk

  • (irrespective of achieving my goal, you will receive a free holiday for your 1000USD Contribution) 

A Contribution of 1000USD includes all the perks listed below:

  • EACH $1000USD CONTRIBUTOR WILL RECEIVE FREE HOLIDAY ACCOMMODATION FOR TWO (2) PEOPLE AT MY BUSH COTTAGE
  • (TO BE BOOKED AND FINALIZED ASAP FOR 2015)

  • a beautiful wildlife calendar, 
  • a “Big Five” cup
  • and wildlife Safari Bush hat 
  • a Big Five Tray and coasters, 
  • a set of Big Five place mats 
  • a beautiful ladies handbag.  (All items sent to your address) Please allow 1-2 weeks for delivery.

Included: is a pick up and drop off shuttle service from Nelspruit Mpumalanga international airport to the bush cottage, a full one day game drive for two (2) persons on an open game viewer vehicle in the renowned Kruger National Game Reserve, viewing the Big Five: Lion, Elephant, Leopard, Buffalo and Rhino. Breakfast and dinner included. Also one South African traditional meal prepared and served by my wife (Vernesse) and myself (Lukas) under the beautiful South African evening sky. One game drive and sundowner picnic in the conservation area along the Crocodile River bordering the Kruger National Game Reserve. 

There will be ample enough time for leisure, like feeding wild roaming animals and observing birdlife at the cottage.

  • a Big Five Tray and coasters,

Included: is a pick up and drop off shuttle service from Nelspruit Mpumalanga International airport to the bush cottage, a full one day game drive for four (4) persons on a open game viewer vehicle in the renowned Kruger National Game Reserve, viewing the Big Five, Lion, Elephant, Leopard, Buffalo and Rhino. story: If you need to lose weight, but can't find the time or the motivation to do it, I know exactly how you feel. I feel like my body is getting away from me, getting fatter every year. The other night,  I felt like resigning myself to my fat fate, just discouraged beyond hope. "I'm gonna get old, fat, and die!" I thought. Then, something inside me said, "No, you are not giving up," and I got the idea for this "FAT " campaign. Maybe, with your help, I can salvage my body before I get too old to change it. My idea is that if I have something I look forward to, something that I have to get in shape for, I'll have the motivation to do it. If I can get to California every couple of months to surf I'll have to work hard to get in shape. I'll put up on FB how I'm doing, how much I've lost and how exciting it is to be able to do things again, like catch a wave, or scuba dive. Maybe you'll find some motivation, too.

story:
Short Summary

I am opening my own massage clinic to help whole families, including children with special needs and I would love your help! Please and thank you!

We currently live in a world where massage is viewed as a luxury for adults. Actually massage is beneficial for everyone from premature infants to the elderly, from the fully abled to the disabled and including those with autism.  We were all made to enjoy nurturing touch.

Massage stimulates the growth and development of the brain in the very young and in those with special needs. It also promotes bonding between a parent or caregiver and a child, soothes the pain of muscle and nerve injuries, brings comfort to cancer patients, relieves the feelings of stress in PTSD victims and promotes a feeling of well being in all.

About Me

My name is Susan Ray and I am a Licensed Massage Therapist. I am the single mother of 3 beautiful young daughters, one of whom has special needs. I have seen first hand the benefits of massage for my special needs daughter and her sisters.  I am passionate about helping those with special needs no matter their age!

I am certified in Swedish Massage, prenatal, pediatric and autism massage. I will soon be taking a class with Tina Allen of the Liddle Kidz Foundation to become a certified teacher of infant massage in order to run classes to teach parents how to provide soothing touch for their infant. I have experience in working with clients with sports injuries, sore muscles, arthritis, cancer and those who just want to shed the tensions of the day.

 I’ve been working at a corporate massage chain but am limited in what I do as they do not work with children and that is my driving goal. I am very successful where I work and have many clients who request me and refer their friends to me. I love what I do!  I just want to do more.

My Goal

My vision is to establish my own clinic where I can work with whole families including children with special needs, as well as military veterans and others who may experience PTSD disorders. I have taken a leap of faith and rented a building to open my own clinic. It needs fresh paint, carpeting, office supplies and business equipment.  With your financial support I will be able to open a one of a kind clinic here in East Central Illinois that provides services for all ages.

The Details

The name of my business is Agape Hearts and Hands Massage.  Agape (uh-gop-eh) is a Greek word meaning “unconditional love.”  Loving touch promotes healing.

 October 1, 2014 is my opening date.

I have a network of professionals who will begin referring clients to me as soon as my doors are open, including pediatricians, other physicians and nurses, a military veteran who volunteers to help other veterans with PTSD issues, and teachers, in addition to friends and family.

What We Need              

We need new carpet, fresh paint, an upgraded computer with business software, filing cabinets, clipboards, charts for clients, copy paper, chairs for the waiting room, a music system with soft, soothing music, decorations for the rooms, and a small table and chairs for the children’s corner with books and activities. Something I don’t need necessarily but would love to have is a massage bed with adjustable hydraulic lift for raising and lowering the clients to make massage easier and more comfortable.

What you get is a warm thank you from me and the other therapists who will work with me, as well as the satisfaction of knowing that you are helping special needs children and their families to have therapy that promotes peace in their households which will assist with bonding and trust in the families. You can be proud to be a donor to a business that will bring relief from pain and healing to many from the very young to the elderly. You will be a part of something new and innovative, a trend setter. I will happily keep you informed on the progress of the company and success stories.

Risks and Challenges

As with any new business, there is always the risk of failure. However, I have a large circle of clients and professionals who are as excited about this project as I am and other therapists who would like to share the rent so they can utilize the rooms as well.  We all have a great love for helping people to feel their best. We are all experienced and successful at our current jobs as Licensed Massage Therapists. If I don't raise the whole amount of money needed, I will tighten my belt and make do with less...throw rugs over the old nasty carpet instead of new carpet, milk crates instead of filing cabinets, wait for fresh paint on the walls. I am not going to fail because I have a great team working with me, I have experience, and I have passion for my work and for my cause of helping whole families.  I have someone with a marketing degree on my team as well as someone with a business degree and bookkeeping skills. I also have a small business mentor working with me.

I have overcome many obstacles to arrive where I am now and I'm confident that I can overcome any challenges that arise with this business as well.

    My goal is to begin my business without being encumbered with a load of debt so that I am free to concentrate on building my practice. I am so excited to reach out to families and help the children as well as the adults.

      Other Ways You Can Help

      Please consider making a monetary contribution to assist me in helping others and also share and like my information on Facebook, Twitter and by word of mouth. All help is deeply appreciated.
story_txt:
Short Summary
I am opening my own massage clinic to help whole families, including children with special needs and I would love your help! Please and thank you! 
We currently
live in a world where massage is viewed as a luxury for adults. Actually massage is beneficial for everyone
from premature infants to the elderly, from the fully abled to the disabled and
including those with autism.  We were all
made to enjoy nurturing touch.
Massage
stimulates the growth and development of the brain in the very young and in
those with special needs. It also promotes bonding between a parent or
caregiver and a child, soothes the pain of muscle and nerve injuries, brings
comfort to cancer patients, relieves the feelings of stress in PTSD victims and
promotes a feeling of well being in all.
About Me
My name is
Susan Ray and I am a Licensed Massage Therapist. I am the single mother of 3 beautiful
young daughters, one of whom has special needs. I have seen first hand the
benefits of massage for my special needs daughter and her sisters.  I am passionate about helping those with
special needs no matter their age!
I am certified
in Swedish Massage, prenatal, pediatric and autism massage. I will soon be
taking a class with Tina Allen of the Liddle Kidz Foundation to become a
certified teacher of infant massage in order to run classes to teach parents
how to provide soothing touch for their infant. I have experience in working
with clients with sports injuries, sore muscles, arthritis, cancer and those
who just want to shed the tensions of the day. 
 I’ve been working at a corporate massage chain
but am limited in what I do as they do not work with children and that is my
driving goal. I am very successful where I work and have many clients who
request me and refer their friends to me. I love what I do!  I just want to do more.
My Goal
My vision is
to establish my own clinic where I can work with whole families including
children with special needs, as well as military veterans and others who may
experience PTSD disorders. I have taken a leap of faith and rented a building
to open my own clinic. It needs fresh paint, carpeting, office supplies and
business equipment.  With your financial
support I will be able to open a one of a kind clinic here in East Central
Illinois that provides services for all ages.

story:
My name is Shaina Seidenberg and I am a dancer, teacher, choreographer, and yogi! I've been wanting to immerse myself in the Yoga Shakti teacher training program for several years now, and am so eager to begin! I have received so many things from yoga in three short years. I am more aware, focused, and observant of all of the nuances inside of my body and out in the world. As a dancer, it's been so crucial to learn healthy alignment for the body while moving, and I am looking forward to spreading that awareness with all of my current dance students and future yoga students. 


I know this program will transform my life, and it's inevitable that I will share my new insights with others!  That's the most important thing about this campaign and program to me, finding newer freedoms inside of ourselves and the world.To be able to observe the challenges in our body, mind, and spirit is the first step in setting them free. I am looking forward to delving deeper into my yoga studies, and aiding the healing and freedom of others along the way! 


Anything you contribute will be put towards the my Yoga Shakti 200-hour teacher training program that runs for 10 months.  I will be studying for 15 hours each month, along with unlimited yoga classes every week. I will learn the movement aspects of yoga as well as meditation, ayurveda, philosophy, anatomy, and the business of yoga. For each donation amount there are certain perks, so be sure to check out the details and receive complimentary dance/yoga classes for you and/or a group of any size at any location!

The program is a total of $3,400 and I am hoping to raise $1,000 by April 23, 2015! Thanks so much for your generous contributions. Free yoga and dance classes coming your way!!!

story:
Lauren's story


Hi, my name is Dean, Lauren's Grandfather. I have served the Canadian public during the first Gulf War, the former Yugoslavia, and more recently in Afghanistan.

My daughter and her fiancé gave birth to a beautiful baby girl on the 12th of December, 2012. When Lauren was six months old, her mother, Megan was feeding her solids for the first time. Lauren aspirated and stopped breathing, and 911 was called. She was admitted to The Children's Hospital of Eastern Ontario (CHEO). After a lengthy stay and many tests, it was determined that Lauren was born without Myelin (a protective and essential nerve coating that passes messages inside the brain). This news was very hard for Megan and DJ to hear, because they never suspected that anything was wrong with Lauren before her stay at CHEO. 

Lauren is now 14 months old, and has recently undergone her second MRI, and the results were not good. The specialists (neurologists) that deal with this type of genetic disorder are dumbfounded, and cannot categorize her problem.

Lauren's file/case will be sent to scientists in the Netherlands and the US for further examination, with hope that there is a ground breaking technique or possibility for Lauren to undergo some type of treatment.

Lauren is a special child, she is always happy, and although she is very limited to lying down most of the time she is making progress the only way she knows how. Her eyesight is very limited (legally blind) and she uses a Gastrostomy tube to feed. She is now 20 pounds and her mental state is similar to a four month old, but developing on a daily basis.

With your help, her parents will be able to travel and seek the specialists care that Lauren is going to need. My daughter, Megan, has been by her side 24/7 since this all unfolded. The money would also go to helping her young parents succeed in their own lives, and I know that this will be greatly appreciated.

More pictures and videos to follow soon.

story:
For Sale!

Los Angeles-based professional basketball team not named "Lakers."   Previous owner "retiring" after 30+ years.   Interested parties should be tolerant of all races, able to think before speaking and generally not be an overall douche.   Ability to assemble a playoff-caliber team more than just occasionally is a plus!   "Motivated" seller!

Livin' the Dream!


Remember when you were a kid, sitting on the sidelines, watching your friends play basketball?  You knew they'd never pick you because you couldn't jump, you couldn't shoot and you always threw the ball to the other team?     Remember how that ate you up inside and how you vowed you'd one day get revenge by owning your own professional basketball team and never letting them play?  

 Of course you do -- that's every young boy's dream.   From the moment you learned how to format an Excel spreadsheet to when you calculated your first price-earnings ratio, you knew you wanted to own a professional basketball franchise.  


Not me, though.  I didn't want to become an NBA owner until the other night when I learned the Los Angeles Clippers were about to become the professional sports version of a "distressed sale."  

Of course, there's more to owning  a sports team than just buying and trading your friends.  As Donald Sterling recently found out,  you have to have respect your players,  appreciate the fans and keep the money flowing to your mistress so she doesn't take the first Bentley she sees to TMZ with a Gucci bag full of incriminating "archives."    Because of Sterling's -- how shall I put this? -- "racial numbskullery,"  the team he owned and mismanaged for 33 is now up for sale.  And I want to buy it!!

Problem is...  I don't have a billion dollars.  


That's where YOU come in!  You can help me accomplish this days-old dream by contributing to my 100% racism-free campaign to buy the Clippers.   Be one of the first ten people to chip in, and I will proudly post a picture of you on my Instagram account.  Yes, even you, Magic Johnson! 


Act now!  Don't miss out on this opportunity to help me do something I never knew I wanted to do until recently!    (Now I suppose I have to go open an Instagram account).  

What's in it For You? 

Well, that's kind of a selfish attitude, but since you asked...

If you're going to help me purchase the Clippers, I want to make it worth your while.  Unfortunately, Indiegogo won't let me do that -- apparently they're sticklers for "the law," or something.    So instead of letting you purchase shares of the team along with me, I've set up several tiers of "perks" to entice you to contribute to my days-old quest.


Ooh... no, I'm sorry.  Not those kind of perks!  

For the record, "perks" are basically worthless trinkets or accolades that, for some strange reason, people tend to like.  Personally, I don't get it, but if you're willing to shell out dough for a pat on the back and a public thank you, who am I to argue?  

So take a look at the perks I've compiled.   If all you've got is a buck, there's a cheap, worthless item just for you!    If you've got a few more dollars in your pocket, you can have dinner with this beautiful and talented Hollywood actress!


It should be noted that this is not a "V. Stiviano" type of situation here.  It's just dinner.   Nothing more is implied!   It will take more than a couple of Bentleys and a Range Rover for this Hollywood starlet to make you her Sugar Daddy.   (The Ferrari on top might do it, though).    


Why Buy the Clippers?

Uh... why not?  

 I'll admit, when the week began, I wasn't really entertaining the idea of owning an NBA franchise.  But then I thought "why couldn't I own a professional sports team?"   After dismissing the obvious answers of "lack of experience" and "general business ineptitude,"  I pushed forward, fired up the ol' dot-com box and launched this Indiegogo campaign.  I figured if the guy who owns the Chicago Cubs could do it, why not me?    

And did I mention that my ownership would be 100% racism free?! 

Won't you help me reach my goal?   Hurry, before some coalition of Mel Gibson, Paula Deen and Cliven Bundy swoops and and buys the team from under me! 

What Happens if I Can't Buy the Clippers?

Look... I'll be honest with you.  I'm gonna keep the money.  I'll make a good faith effort to buy the club, but if I don't raise enough cash or if the asking price is ultimately too high, I'll channel the dough to some other worthy project.


For starters, Lana (the actress mentioned above) and I are filmmakers, and our first priority (after buying the Clippers, of course) is to produce a film and a  comedy web series or two.    Should a deal to buy the Clips fall through, a portion of the money will be used to develop and/or produce our projects.  And any "perks" involving involving parties or press conferences will be related to publicity and promotion of the film.  Who knows... you might get to walk the red carpet with a big time Hollywood star!


(Just so we're clear... it probably won't be any of these stars you're walking the red carpet with.   Full disclosure:  You probably won't be walking the red carpet with any Hollywood stars.)

Oh... and just to show that we're not total self-absorbed jerks, we'll also donate a portion of the money to a charity that helps fight racism.  Not the LA chapter of the NAACP though -- at least until they can explain why a man with years of documented evidence of day-to-day racial discrimination was twice (TWICE!!) set to receive a "Lifetime Achievement Award."    Seriously... how did that happen?

That's all!   Now start contributing!   I'm tired of sitting here not owning a professional basketball team!

story:
Help our chapter reach our goal of $25,000 for cancer research!


The Delta Pi chapter of Phi Kappa Sigma at Indiana University is setting a goal to have one of the largest philanthropies at IU this year! We are setting our goal high at a total of $25,000, all of which is going to a great cause. 

Light The Night is an event being held on October 10th at Dunn Meadow, on IU's campus at 6 PM. We will have a DJ, and will be walking down a 1.3 mile path with tons of glow sticks, as well as participating in lots of fun activities! We would greatly appreciate your support to make this philanthropy our best yet!


Our Fraternity's national philanthropy partner is The Leukemia & Lymphoma Society. The Leukemia & Lymphoma Society is the largest not-for-profit health agency dedicated to finding cures for people with leukemia, lymphoma or myeloma—collectively known as blood cancers. The Leukemia & Lymphoma Society has one goal: a world without blood cancers. The Leukemia & Lymphoma Society funds lifesaving blood cancer research around the world, provides free information and support services, and is the voice for all blood cancer patients seeking access to quality, affordable, coordinated care. To learn more, visitwww.LLS.org.

We have a bunch of really cool perks set up for our contributors, so check it out and stay in touch! We are shooting a video of the event and want to invite you to be in it! 

If you are not able to contribute to our campaign, please share our site with friends on Facebook and Twitter!

story:
Hi, my name is Maureen Kelley and I have been a licensed medical aesthetician for over ten years treating all different kinds of skin ailments from acne, eczema, psoriasis, burns, pruitis, venous ulcers, rosacea, and more.  Typically these patients are prescribed steroids, triple antibiotics, oily sealants, silver nitrate, and other products that have no positive results or don't actually heal the skin, providing temporary relief.  Some of these products have bad side effects such as thinning of the skin, dependency, and even toxicity.

Many of my clients were desperate for a natural alternative that would help heal the skin and not have side effects.  I searched for a solution and found that zinc has been used as far back as the Egyptians for healing skin!  The problem with most zinc products today is they are not in a form that is bio-available (can't absorb it) or they are not naturally derived.  I worked with chemists to develop Epizyn and we are releasing two more formulas with camphor to clam the skin (good for eczema, poison ivy, rashes) and lidocaine for situations where pain relief is needed (burns, sunburns, venous ulcers) to help more people.


This campaign is important to get a better solution out to people who need it.  Skin is the body's largest organ and 95% of people have some type of skin issue to resolve somewhere on their body.  I have seen first hand the powerful results of zinc helping to rebuild the skins ability to heal. 



Epizyn is free of parabens, oils, and is a pure zinc gluconate with amino acids taurine and lysine.  Its clear and will not stain clothes.

Epizyn comes in a clear bottle in a clear tube ready for use. 

For testimonials including many from doctors click here: https://www.epizyn.com/testimonials

If you are a doctor, click here to see our clinical study: https://www.epizyn.com/doctors


To see our articles, please click here: https://www.epizyn.com/articles

By being a contributor you will have a great natural product that will help almost any skin condition you have.  Contributors will help Epizyn get into nursing homes and surgery clinics where it is needed to help speed recovery and reduce risk of infections.  We will be donating bottles to facilities that need a solution that ultimately provides relief to those in need.  In most cases, alternative solutions are not covered by medicare or insurance.   Epizyn cured a chronic venous ulcer on my mom that caused her nurse to start recommending Epizyn.
We need funding to get the word out about the effectiveness of Epizyn as a natural healer for those suffering with skin conditions- especially those with no alternatives or access.  Epizyn is becoming known among moms and specialist doctors, but it is our mission to get Epizyn into the hands of the elderly where silver nitrate and steroids are used for chronic conditions that dont have a resolution and cause side effects.  

The Impact

Every time someone contributes, there will be relief given to an elderly person in need of a solution at a needy nursing home or a bottle sent to a soldier overseas.  Every bottle sold will produce a duplicate bottle for a person in need. 
Our biggest challenges are regulatory concerns over natural products.  (sounds crazy, but its true!) We are working with wound care specialists to get high level approval at state funded nursing homes and care facilities.  

Other Ways You Can Help

If you know someone that needs a product like Epizyn, please have them go to the website www.epizyn.com or tell them about this solution.  Epizyn is 100% guaranteed with no risk.  We will always take returns and refund your money if not satisfied.  Thank you for your support!

Our press release video can be seen here:

READ THIS INFOGRAPHIC TO UDNERSTAND HOW INC GLUCONATE HEALS SKIN
story_txt:
Hi, my name is Maureen Kelley and I have been a licensed medical aesthetician for over ten years treating all different kinds of skin ailments from acne, eczema, psoriasis, burns, pruitis, venous ulcers, rosacea, and more.  Typically these patients are prescribed steroids, triple antibiotics, oily sealants, silver nitrate, and other products that have no positive results or don't actually heal the skin, providing temporary relief.  Some of these products have bad side effects such as thinning of the skin, dependency, and even toxicity. Many of my clients were desperate for a natural alternative that would help heal the skin and not have side effects.  I searched for a solution and found that zinc has been used as far back as the Egyptians for healing skin!  The problem with most zinc products today is they are not in a form that is bio-available (can't absorb it) or they are not naturally derived.  I worked with chemists to develop Epizyn and we are releasing two more formulas with camphor to clam the skin (good for eczema, poison ivy, rashes) and lidocaine for situations where pain relief is needed (burns, sunburns, venous ulcers) to help more people. 
This campaign is important to get a better solution out to people who need it.  Skin is the body's largest organ and 95% of people have some type of skin issue to resolve somewhere on their body.  I have seen first hand the powerful results of zinc helping to rebuild the skins ability to heal.  
Epizyn is free of parabens, oils, and is a pure zinc gluconate with amino acids taurine and lysine.  Its clear and will not stain clothes.Epizyn comes in a clear bottle in a clear tube ready for use.  




For testimonials including many from doctors click here: https://www.epizyn.com/testimonials
If you are a doctor, click here to see our clinical study: https://www.epizyn.com/doctors

story:
Pictures are of ingredients: info on website...interested? (www.organicskinrepair.com)

damiana leaf

a lot of preparation and now LIPID PURE (tm) is ready

clove bud

Topical anhydrous, organic, botanical remedy for skin ailments and joint pain melts into skin on contact and provides immediate relief.  Positive reports for five years from hundreds of men and women are all consistent.

sweet almond


yohimbe bark

LIPID PURE lessens a headache, eases joint pain, reduces swelling, calms rash, ends itching, stimulates energy, improves mood. That is a lot of results for a little product !  Believe it, experience it, support it.

muira puama

rice bran oil (good sun screen)

No additives what-so-ever--ever! 

passion flower


Organic rainforest nutrients permeate skin to deliver micro-encapsulated  essential nutrients to the general circulation.  Immediate results noticed by hundreds of men and women who  unanimously agree: LIPID PURE is all it claims to be.

FDA approved botanical ingredients in state of the art natural science (known as transdermal phytotherapy)  delivers peptides, builds ceramides, releases enzymes, feeds anti-oxidants into general circulation through largest organ of the body, the skin, a two way membrane that is permeable with long chain fatty acids. Water is not used.
Over the years, LIPID PURE has proven to have multiple benefits. Many have experienced immediate relief from head ache or joint pain upon application which immediately softens skin with deep hydration of triple lipid formulation.

LIPID PURE is trademark approved and contains nothing but pure botanical nutrients.

  • Excellent reception of initial product introduction by both men and women shows LIPID PURE to be worthy of broader reach. Organic Skin Repair LLC will use funds to create 5,000 jars of LIPID PURE and market these widely to men and women who seek relief from aching, itching discomfort and who are in need of an effective moisturizer that delivers immediate results.
  • Supply chain in place with organic cosmetic manufacturer ready to go.
  • Marketing with infomercial, home shopping, internet affiliates and retail "partners"  continues as funding is secured.
  • Any funds received are used toward achieving goals.

Many large companies started with one product.

Devotion to and confidence in LIPID PURE continues. Concentration on LIPID PURE as first of several remedies already formulated and tested is strategy to build on initial product success.  Organic Skin Repair LLC enters an extremely competitive field with LIPID PURE as first offer. All profits from LIPID PURE to be used to build ORGANIC SKIN REPAIR LLC to be highly regarded company with integrity in all business practices.

  • LIPID PURE  makes people feel better fast.
  • Organic Skin Repair LLC has finished and tested formulas of eight other remedies including home spa treatments, toothpaste and mouthwash.
  • Since 2007, Organic Skin Repair LLC has exceeded expectation in quality products. Now it is time to spread the word.

Risks & Challenges

As the market for organic skin care products grows and grows, so do the number of product entries. As the field thickens with promises, people are skeptical. Organic Skin Repair LLC is devoted to the education of the importance of skin repair through the development of products that show -- rather than tell -- LIPID PURE is all it claims to be.

Personal and sweat equity, confidence built from user reports, faith in the vision and unwavering determination despite the difficulties have supported LIPID PURE since 2008.

Product quality, devoted management, excellent suppliers, marketing expertise, consumer approval encourage continued efforts.

Organic Skin Repair LLC has not yet tapped its potential market. With funding in place the plans can be executed and success will be achieved. Without funding, LIPID PURE will not be made available to general public.

If you can contribute, thank you thank you!! If not, please send this campaign to others who might want to learn about it.
Organic Skin Repair LLC also formulates other products including toothpaste, home spa treatments and anti-microbial spray. These products are developed and proven. Need funds to help others to heal in effective and affordable way.
Thank you again.

story:
Short Summary


The rate of disease and killer viruses around the world has been increasing since time began. Every generation faces a new outbreak and a new challenge in the world of human viruses and disease. Everything from HIV, various forms of cancer and even Ebola have all taken center stage causing huge distress, loss of lives and frustration within the medical and healing professions.

Highly regarded Medical Researchers have reported that Viruses and Bacteria have been mutating into organisms that are resistant to all modern antibiotics; it would seem that humanity is fighting a losing battle in the war no disease.

This Crowdfunding campaign has been launched to fund research into the properties of Silver Atoms.  Silver is already known to be anti-viral and anti-bacterial in nature,  no studies have ever been done on Atom Particle Colloidal Silver.  We believe that silver atoms will pave the way in the fight against the emergent strains of the most common viruses.   


The Company

GoldenGevity, a company that has been in research and development of the properties of noble metals since 2005, has put this campaign together. As a company we have operated in this space for over 10 years and we are in possession of a proprietary process that can produce atom particles in distilled water without chemicals.

Early on the company carried out research on metals that were anti cancerous and found that Silver, Platinum, Iridium and Ruthenium were used to treat Cancer by Healthcare Professionals, and further research uncovered that silver had been reported to kill well over 650 different viruses including the HIV virus.

By testing the efficacy of Silver Atoms and other antioxidant metals, against viruses and bacteria’s the company will be able to produce "medical grade", colloidal silver atom products which are  already known to be anti-viral and anti-microbial in nature, for the medical profession and consumers alike, which may lead into further studies on how to apply these products against stubborn viruses and bacteria of which some also cause cancer and other life taking illness's that are caused by stubborn viruses and bacteria.


This campaign will raise funds to achieve FIVE very important goals:

1.)  Carry out antimicrobial efficacy testing on 5 to 10 common viruses

2.)  Carry out antimicrobial efficacy testing on 5 to 10 common bacteria.

3.)  Carry out Time Analysis of effectiveness of the 10 common Viruses and Bacteria.

4.)  Carry out antimicrobial efficacy testing on HIV, Tuberculosis and Hepatitis along with the Time Analysis of effectiveness of the HIV and Tuberculosis and Hepatitis viruses.

5.)  Expand the production capacity of the company by securing larger facilities, and update the corporate branding with web development and marketing activities

Even small donations — $10, $25 or $50 — can add up to big numbers if we all pull together.

Larger amounts like $100, $250 or $500 would help us get there even faster and will get you your very own high quality Colloidal Silver products that you can try out for yourself – check out our perks on the right

Won’t you donate what you can today and spread the word to your family and friends?

GoldenGevity’s ground breaking research will change the game. Lets work together to stop the suffering – Donate Today!

The reasons we are planning this testing is because part of the problem in developing effective solutions to some of the most common viruses and bacteria lies in the way the medicines are delivered into the human body.


For decades the standard for dispensing medicines and even dietary supplements has been:

  • Micrograms
  • Milligrams 

These types of unit may contain trillions of total atoms content, which means that they are huge and bulky and cannot be absorbed by the body easily, nor can they penetrate a virus. The same applies to nano meter, or nano particles.

Viruses and Bacteria size can exceed 200 nm (nano-meters) or more in size, making the solution very simple:

The production of single ATOM Particles of elements that are known to be antiviral and antibacterial, such as Silver, Copper, Zinc, and others.

At GoldenGevity We have developed a process to produce high parts per million (PPM) atom size particles of these metals and other noble elements that by themselves are pure antioxidants in nature.

Because Atoms can seamlessly slide right into the pathogens at the cellular level, they can produce astonishing, fast results without any reported side effects.

It would appear that, the atom particle size supplements are the answer to ever mutating antibiotic resistant strains, providing for the first time, a real solution to modern medicinal problems.

We know that there is still a long way to go and hopefully with your help we can complete our crucial testing and take a huge step forward in the use of noble metals in the treatment of serious viruses and disease.

Check out the perks on the right and purchase your very own bottle of Colloidal Silver and see what a difference it will make to your life – and the lives of millions of others.

As a company, GoldenGevity is a market leader in the field of Colloidal noble element remedies. We started by selling colloidal silver 3000 PPM, and as time progressed we added the other elements and combination of elements.

We were the first to introduce Atom Particle sized Colloidal Silver that:

  • Have the absolute smallest particle size in the industry...Atoms
  • Have the Highest Parts Per Million that can be diluted downward.
  • Have Zero Chemical added from start to finish.

We then added Gold, Iridium, Platinum, Rhodium, Ruthenium which are known to be pure antioxidants at the core of most plants, fruits, and vegetables, that may have anti cancerous properties and we continue to be #1 in atom particle production of trace mineral dietary supplements.

Noble Metals

In chemistry, the noble metals are metals that are resistant to corrosion and oxidation in moist air, as opposed to most base metals, the short list comprises:

  • Ruthenium
  • Rhodium
  • Palladium
  • Silver
  • Osmium
  • Iridium
  • Platinum
  • Gold.

We are born with these metals and are found in the body and when we are low on any of them we may become ill. Many of these noble metals are also the core elements in natural in herbs and plants that are often sold over the counter.

Noble Metals especially in atom-sized particles are not heavy metals, heavy metals are considered to be toxic such as Lead, Mercury, and others.

About Atoms vs Nanotechnology 

Its All about the Particle size:

Nanotechnology has had a lot of milestones when it comes to rapidly advancing the ability of humans to manipulate and use materials at the Nano scale; For instance Nano scale particles are being developed into mechanical “machines” that can be used for many industrial and medical applications that are small enough to be tiny robots that can be controlled externally. 

But for medicinal and dietary supplement purposes they are quite slow in performance and too large to be assimilated by the human body.

Silver has antibacterial properties and is currently being used in consumer products such as socks, washing machines, and bandages, but still has setbacks since Nano particles can range from 8nm to 200nm and cannot penetrate the pathogens because they are millions if not trillions of times larger than a single silver atom particle.

GoldenGevity’s products

GoldenGevity produces the highest quality atom sized particles of colloidal silver, gold, and other noble metal products that can be used for anti-aging and for general health and well-being.

Most uses of noble metals use the metals at a size such as Nano particles, milligrams and micro-grams that cannot penetrate the virus cells or be absorbed efficiently by the body.

GoldenGevity have developed technology that allows the production of colloidal silver at 3000 particles per million to well over 18,000 parts per million, and are at least 2,500,000 times smaller than the smallest Nano particle and possibly billions of times smaller than the largest nano particles, possibly making their solutions thousands of times more effective in the human body.

GoldenGevity products are:

  • Pure
  • Powerful
  • Effective
  • Market leaders
  • Include many noble metals that are found in the body

Won’t you donate what you can today and spread the word to everyone you know with an interest in medical research, healthcare and the global fight against disease.

Our perks are great – they will make a huge difference to your life and help us to help millions of others around the world

Noble metal Products, in particular gold and silver Products, are among the most extensively studied such-materials and have led to the development of in-numerous techniques and methods for molecular diagnostics, imaging, drug delivery and therapeutics. The inclusion of testing of ATOM particles could have a huge impact on the health of the world’s population.

The world's growing population demands increasing access to advanced healthcare treatments.

According to the United Nations Environment Programme (UNEP), the global population will reach over 9 billion by 2050 with nearly 90% of the world's people located in developing countries.

Biomedical technology is an evolving field having enormous potential to positively impact the health care system, through the development of treatments that can penetrate and disarm resistant strains of viruses and bacteria.

Important biomedical applications of atom particle technology that may have potential clinical applications include targeted drug delivery, detection/diagnosis and imaging.

Basic understanding of how atoms, the building blocks of the body, interact with the cells and their biological consequences are evolving, and Noble metal atoms such as gold, silver and Ruthenium are particularly interesting due to their size and shape and anti-microbial, and anti-oxidant properties.


Furthermore, recent investigations are demonstrating promising application of these atoms as self-therapeutics as natural dietary supplements.

To realize the potential promise of these unique particles for future clinical translation, it is of utmost importance that further efficacy testing be carried out. With the right level of testing we can produce medical grade noble metal products that can provide a real solution in the war on disease. 

Atom Particles and Cancer

Today, 1 in 2 males and 1 in 3 females in the United States will develop cancer at some point during their lifetimes, and 1 in 4 males and 1 in 5 females in the United States will die from the disease.

New methods for detection and treatment have dramatically improved cancer care, however, improved detection and increasing exposure to carcinogens has led to higher rates of cancer incidence, clinicians and researchers have not balanced that increase with a similar decrease in cancer mortality rates even though billions of dollars are poured in through charity. This mismatch highlights a clear and urgent need for increasingly potent and selective methods with which to detect and treat cancers at their earliest stages. 

The unique and newly discovered properties of noble metal atom particle colloids that may have anti cancerous properties may enhance the specificities with which bio-medical agents are delivered, possibly complementing their efficacy or diminishing unintended side effects.

The next waves of studies must include Atom Particles since size is everything when it comes down to penetrating pathogens and cancer causing free radicals.

Gold, silver and other noble metals such as ruthenium afford a particularly unique set of physiological and optical properties which can be leveraged in applications ranging from in vitro/vivo therapeutics and drug delivery to imaging and diagnostics, surgical guidance, and treatment monitoring.

All of this evidence strongly suggests that the use of noble metals in products such as colloidal silver atoms can be a great source of treatment against viruses that are traditionally challenging and produce resistant strains.

By increasing our testing and efficacy research with the noble metals we will be able to join forces with these medical professionals by providing products that are proven to be effective in the fight against these viruses.



With your help we can achieve all of our goals and impact the lives of billions of people around the world.

You can contribute in many ways:

  • Share our message extensively on social media

  • Contribute and purchase the perks below – you can improve your general health and well being like so many others by investing in our wonderful products

  • Send the gift of good health to someone you know that can truly benefit from our products, be purchasing one of the perks to the right and support this campaign in the process

  • Tell everyone you know about the pending breakthroughs in noble element atom particle technology

  • Watch this space – follow our progress here, on social media and check out our website www.gold2live.com

GoldenGevity’s ground-breaking research will change the game.

Lets work together to stop the suffering – Donate Today!

**Delivery of the above items may take up to 12 months; you must register on line at the storefront with a promotional code 
that will be provided to you after the campaign is finished. 

Follow our campaign on social media and remember to share the message

https://www.facebook.com/GoldengevityHighPpmColloidalSilver

Twitter:  https://twitter.com/silvercolloids

Contact us for more information or to enquire about your perks.

Email: sales@gold2live.com

Tel:  619-752-6777

     leaders
Include
     many noble metals that are found in the body


Won’t you donate what you can today and spread the word to
everyone you know with an interest in medical research, healthcare and the
global fight against disease.
Our
perks are great – they will make a huge difference to your life and help us to
help millions of others around the world


















Noble metal Products, in particular gold and silver Products,
are among the most extensively studied such-materials and have led to the
development of in-numerous techniques and methods for molecular diagnostics,
imaging, drug delivery and therapeutics. The inclusion of testing of ATOM
particles could have a huge impact on the health of the world’s population.
The world's growing
population demands increasing access to advanced healthcare treatments.

According to the United Nations Environment Programme (UNEP),
the global population will reach over 9 billion by 2050 with nearly 90% of the
world's people located in developing countries.
Biomedical technology is an evolving
field having enormous potential to positively impact the health care system,
through the development of treatments that can penetrate and disarm resistant
strains of viruses and bacteria.
Important biomedical applications of atom
particle technology that may have potential clinical applications include
targeted drug delivery, detection/diagnosis and imaging. 
Basic understanding of how atoms, the
building blocks of the body, interact with the cells and their biological
consequences are evolving, and Noble metal atoms such as gold, silver and Ruthenium
are particularly interesting due to their size and shape and anti-microbial,
and anti-oxidant properties. 






Furthermore, recent investigations are
demonstrating promising application of these atoms as self-therapeutics as
natural dietary supplements. 
To realize the potential promise of these
unique particles for future clinical translation, it is of utmost importance that
further efficacy testing be carried out. With the right level of testing we can
produce medical grade noble metal products that can provide a real solution in
the war on disease. 

Atom Particles and Cancer
Today, 1 in 2 males and 1 in 3 females in the
United States will develop cancer at some point during their lifetimes, and 1
in 4 males and 1 in 5 females in the United States will die from the disease. 
New methods for detection and treatment have
dramatically improved cancer care, however, improved detection and increasing
exposure to carcinogens has led to higher rates of cancer incidence, clinicians
and researchers have not balanced that increase with a similar decrease in
cancer mortality rates even though billions of dollars are poured in through
charity. This mismatch highlights a clear and urgent need for increasingly
potent and selective methods with which to detect and treat cancers at their
earliest stages. 

The unique and newly
discovered properties of noble metal atom particle colloids that may have anti cancerous properties may enhance the specificities
with which bio-medical agents are delivered, possibly complementing their efficacy or
diminishing unintended side effects.
The next waves of studies must include Atom
Particles since size is everything when it comes down to penetrating pathogens
and cancer causing free radicals.
Gold, silver and other noble metals such as
ruthenium afford a particularly unique set of physiological and optical
properties which can be leveraged in applications ranging from in vitro/vivo
therapeutics and drug delivery to imaging and diagnostics, surgical guidance,
and treatment monitoring.
All
of this evidence strongly suggests that the use of noble metals in products such
as colloidal silver atoms can be a great source of treatment against viruses
that are traditionally challenging and produce resistant strains. 
By
increasing our testing and efficacy research with the noble metals we will be
able to join forces with these medical professionals by providing products that
are proven to be effective in the fight against these viruses.






With your help we can achieve all of
our goals and impact the lives of billions of people around the world.

     campaign in the process




Tell

story:
Pallacanestro Cooperativa Bologna: Il Sogno

Ci ispiriamo ad una lega attiva e consolidata a Madrid da ormai cinque anni, che ad oggi conta più di cinquanta squadre ed è un esempio per tutte le realtà di sport popolare in Europa.

Le Regole

Si gioca 5 vs 5 e le squadre possono essere miste,
Non è prevista una quota di iscrizione, ma è richiesta cooperazione e partecipazione.
L'arbitraggio è affidato al buon senso dei giocatori in campo, chiamati a osservare un'unica regola fondamentale: i falli li chiama la difesa. 

Obiettivo della campagna

Vogliamo stilare un calendario orientativo entro la fine di aprile per poter partire con un primo campionato sperimentale nei mesi di maggio e giugno.

La raccolta fondi serve ad aiutarci a sostenere i costi di gestione e manutenzione di un campetto pubblico, comprare magliette e adesivi con il nostro logo e organizzare tornei di 3 vs 3 per autofinanziarci e farci conoscere in città.

Il successo riscosso al torneo del primo Ottobre svolto alla Lunetta Gamberini ci fa credere nelle potenzialità di questo progetto, per cui abbiamo deciso di organizzare un altro torneo per l'8 Aprile. I tornei targati PCB sono giornate di festa: le partitelle di 3 vs 3 sono accompagnate da musica, pranzo popolare e birra in quantità. La raccolta fondi è utile anche a rendere sempre più alta la qualità del cibo e della birra che offriremo.
Con un'offerta minima di 20 euro ci impegniamo a farvi avere una delle nostre magliette, con offerte inferiori ai 20 euro avrete tutta la nostra stima e la certezza di aver contribuito al sogno PCB. 
Per info e aggiornamenti seguiteci sulla nostra pagina Facebook Pallacanestro Cooperativa Bologna.Stay Tuned. https://www.facebook.com/ligabasketcooperativa/?fref=ts

COOPERA O REVIENTA

story:
goalWA

goalWA.net went online in 2011 and since then millions of views have been recorded over our various sites. We need public monetary support to continue to provide the widest coverage of soccer in Washington.

  • David Falk is a writer, webmaster, photographer...but most of all a soccer fan.
  • David has donated thousands of work hours to establish goalWA.net.
  • Now its our turn to show support for our sport, our state, our soccer news source!

What We Need

  • goalWA.net is hoping to raise $7000. this year.
  • Our writers, photographers and staff have volunteered for years now.
  • It would be great to reward their efforts with something more tangible than "shares" or "likes."

The Impact

  • Washington is the STATE of soccer. goalWA.net is its voice.
  • Other states marvel at our scene and our coverage.
  • Let's let them marvel at our support of local soccer news, too!

story:
SAY HELLO TO FITKAT: A SMART BAND THAT TRACKS YOUR DAILY FITNESS PROGRESS AND AN SOS DEVICE THAT COULD SAVE YOUR LIFE




Fitkat is the only smart band in the world that primarily aims to improve your health, while keeping you connected to those who are closest to you. The Fitkat coaches you to adopt a healthier fitness and eating habits. Fitkat not only helps you stay alive, but it also lets you send and receive social media alerts, and send out distress alerts to your friends and family if you need help. With a double click on the SOS button your “Guardians” will receive your real time location


The main aim of Fitkat is to provide everyone with a simple and easy tool to use that works as an efficient and user-friendly fitness tracker. However, we make sure that our product differs from other variations on the market by giving you even more additions to improve and optimize your fitness regime.

The general problem for most people is the tracking of all of the required changes and figures  that tend to play a large part in getting fitter – it can all become a little bit too much for some of us. Well, Fitkat condenses the most important attributes and stats of the day into one easy-to-use system, making it easier than ever to actually get fit.


STAY FIT

Fitkat makes it easier to reach your fitness goals. You can track your daily physical activity and review your stats with just a quick glance at your wrist. Just like a personal trainer, Fitkat guides you to improved wellness by constantly learning about you, your current fitness level, and your future needs.




STAY HYDRATED

To drink water regularly is a big challenge in the day-to-day life. Fitkat will help you by calculating how much water you need, tracking what you drink and gently reminding you when to drink. Your Guardian and coach can also send you timely reminders to drink water if you aren’t drinking enough water. These reminders can be a huge benefit to those of us who regularly turn to soda or coffee/tea for hydration over water.

Benefits of drinking water for your fitness:

* It’s an effective method of combating stress and tiredness.

* Drinking enough water can clear up your skin.

* Drinking enough water can raise your fitness in just a few days.

* It’s beneficial to weight loss and the basic necessity of every professional diet.

* Drinking more water can relieve headaches.


STAY SAFE

Many times, when faced with personal threat, it becomes almost impossible to take the smartphone out from your pocket or handbag, unlock it, and send out an emergency message. In such situations, the Fitkat device could make all the difference in broadcasting that crucial SMS with your location data to loved ones, with a simple double click on the dedicated SOS button on the Fitkat device.

  



FITKAT COMES IN DIFFERENT COLORS

Fitkat will connect to your iOS or Android device via Bluetooth, enabling you to excel in three different branches to improve your lifestyle - Stay Fit | Stay Safe |Stay Connected

ACCURACY

We compared the Fitkat device with different trackers on the market and conducted a benchmark test with the iPhone Health app. Please view the video for the results. 



NOTIFICATIONS

Fitkat is the first product that makes fitness and smart watch technology truly personal. Fitkat combines activity and Location sharing with call/text alerts and up gradable Smart watch apps. Personal trainer meets personal assistant

  • 24/7 Activity Tracking (Steps, Distance, Calories, Active Minutes)
  • Smart Coach
  • Smart-watch Notifications (Call, text/SMS, Meeting reminders)
  • App notifications (Facebook, WeChat, Line, Whatsapp, Twitter etc..)



ECO-SYSTEM

PRODUCT COMPARISON

TIMELINE FOR SHIPMENT 


As seen on GetConnected CES 2015



Meet the team


Frequently Asked Questions

1)  Is the Fitkat band Waterproof?

The Fitkat band is splash proof so you don’t have to worry about rain or sweat from an intense training session. It’s not water proof so don’t submerge it.

2)  How long does the battery last?

The rechargeable battery keeps the Fitkat band going for 14-16 days.

3)  What happens if the Fitkat band is not connected to my phone?

It will continue to function as a watch and fitness tracker.

4)  What is the warranty on the Fitkat band?

Fitkat Inc, provides ONE year warranty for defects in materials and workmanship under normal.

5)  What is the smart Coach function?

The smart coach features bring together fitness freaks that live a healthy life and allow them to share their training methods on our platform.  You can then choose who to work with, download their fitness program and start training.

6)  What is the guardian function?

The Fitkat App allows you to select up to 5 guardians who could be your friends or family. This feature allows your guardians to track your daily progress in real time so they can motivate and push you to reach defined goals, or save you in case of an emergency.

7)  What colors do the Fitkat bands come in?

Fitkat band comes in 6 colors at the moment. You can choose from black, green, blue, pink, yellow and red.

story:
Hello friends and kind strangers,

This is a very exciting summer! The first international Adam's Camp will be held in Ballycastle, Northern Ireland. If you know me, you know how much I believe in Adam's Camp. With that in mind, maybe you can understand how thrilled I am by the prospect of helping to set up the first international camp. I've been invited to train the volunteers, but I need help paying for the plane ticket. Adam's Camp is a nonprofit and cannot pay me or fund the ticket.

In case you don't know, Adam's Camp is an intensive therapy camp for children with developmental disabilities. I first encountered camp as a sibling camper when I was 8 years old. My brother, Benjamin, has multiple undiagnosed disabilities; he is deafblind, nonverbal, in a wheelchair, and has severe cognitive impairments. He's also my favorite person in the world. He's impacted my life in so many positive ways, not least of which is introducing me to Adam's Camp. As soon as I was old enough I started volunteering at camp, and have never looked back. For the past 8 summers I have volunteered in various capacities in Colorado, Nantucket, Alaska, and New Hampshire. Most recently I served as the Outreach Intern and traveled to each location to train volunteers, assist administratively, and identify and implement process improvements.

As cheesy and idealistic as it sounds, I keep coming back because volunteering at Adam's Camp makes me feel like I'm making the world a better place. It makes me feel like my effort, in just a week, can truly make a difference in the life of a camper and their family. I know it's special to feel like I'm making a direct positive impact, and I cherish the feeling.

Adam's Camp has touched many lives, including mine, but I know there are many more who can benefit from its unique model. AC Northern Ireland is the beginning of a new era. I need your help to be able to share the skills that I've developed over the past several summers, and to be able to continue to dedicate my efforts to a cause I believe in. 

If you can help fund my plane ticket, it would mean the universe. Thank you.
