story:
FUNCTIONAL NEUROLOGY IS A FIELD WHICH COULD RE-WRITE THE BOOKS ON THE UNDERSTANDING AND TREATMENT OF NEUROLOGICAL DISEASE. 

Who I am and what I do:

Hi, I’m David B. Sullivan and I’m a board-certified chiropractic neurologist. You might have never heard about that term before, but we’ve been around for quite a while. Chiropractic Neurology is basically about understanding the human brain, how it works, why/how it gets diseased, and how to help make it better without using drugs or surgery. 

I am a founding member of the International Association of Functional Neurology and Rehabilitation (IAFNR). This is the organization that I intend to have my research published through. 

International Assoc. of Functional Neurology and Rehabilitation

Our field has been gaining a lot of exposure in the last few years through some high-profile stories in the news. This type of care was instrumental in the recovery of Pittsburgh Penguin’s star player, Sidney Crosby. It has also been featured on a recent segment of ABC News’ Nightline. This approach to the treatment of neurological disorders has the potential to revolutionize the standard model of care applied to people suffering with neurological diseases. There was even a documentary filmed recently about this type of care. Being a part of that movement, I too am passionate about advancing our understanding and scope, so that we can serve humanity at the highest level possible. 

The founder of this movement, Dr. Frederick Robert Carrick has been quoted as saying: 

“What was once considered a miracle, is [now] a clinical expectation”

I know first hand what he means by this. I, and my colleagues all around the world witness this each week in our clinics. People that have been suffering without hope are finally coming alive again, regaining function and getting back to normal living with functional neurology. 

What we’re doing and why it matters:

Functional neurology is a way to optoimize brain function without the use of drugs or surgery. It is a revolutionary way to care for neurological illness and we are passionate and dedicated to expanding our reach to the patients who need it most. Our ongoing mission is to establish more evidence, support and understanding of exactly how these treatments work, how to apply them best, and how to get this understanding out to the rest of the scientific and healthcare world. 

We need your help in order to carry on this work, and bring this therapy to the rest of the world!! 

We are part of a movement dedicated toward advancing the science, understanding and knowledge of chronic neurological disease. As a whole, we are actively expanding our access to world-class research facilities, equipment and tools, but there is still a large grass roots effort behind this. In essence, clinics like ours are the front line in developing new ideas, hypotheses and approaches which then feed into larger research efforts. Because clinics like ours are 'in the trenches', we have a first-hand perspective on the conditions that real people live with and suffer with. 

Here’s why we need funding and where it will go:

Beyond the humanistic value in this work, research and publishing scientific research takes time, equipment and money. A fair bit of it actually. We are seeking funding of $25,000 in order to advance this effort. 

The funds we raise will go towards purchasing some more sensitive and sophisticated diagnostic, evaluation and treatment equipment to study these therapies in more depth. Our intention is to continue to research these tools so that we understand more completely, what is happening in the brain and why, and how we can use that knowledge for the greatest good of mankind. Our diagnostic equipment and data gathering needs will basically consist of:

  • Automatic blood pressure cuffs
  • Pulse oximeter and perfusion indicator
  • Video nystagmography system
  • A computer terminal to record video data with
  • Electric nerve-stimulator devices 
  • More sensitive scopes and instruments for evaluating nervous system function
  • Vestibular stimulation apparatus 

Here’s how you can take part in something HUGE:

You have the opportunity here, to be a part of something that could literally end the pain and suffering of millions of people across the world. Think about it- you’re donation to our cause could help end the conditions that thousands or millions of people live with every single day. Your donation could help make the difference between someone living well or suffering needlessly. 

We need your help to make this happen!!

To honor your contributions, we’ve selected a variety of perks to choose from. 

At the most basic level, you’ll receive our undying thanks and appreciation. Higher levels of donation will earn you more personalized thanks as well as some brain related activity books. The PDF version of our initial work will be offered to those who can donate in the mid-ranges, and it only get’s better from there. Subsequent higher levels of donations will earn perks such as being thanked publicly in the acknowledgements of the study, a hard-bound copy of the study, a DVD copy of “Hope Restored: Functional Neurology Serves Humanity”, and even a 1-year membership to the International Association of Functional Neurology and Rehabilitation which also includes 4 quarterly journals. 

If you cannot contribute financially at this time, we understand. But you could still help too!

In lieu of a financial donation, you could help us spread the word about our effort to others so that it might reach people who can. You can also spread the word about Functional Neurology and how this movement is quite literally re-writing the level of care possible for neurological disease. 

Please consider sharing this effort among your contacts, both online and in person. Every person who knows about it can help improve the health of millions of people around the world. If ever there was a chance for you to change the world, this is it. Our hope is that in the years to come, you will see this therapy emerge as a front-line treatment for neurological disease. And you’ll know that you helped make it happen!!

Please use the Indiegogo sharing tools to help get the word out about our project. Help us take away the pain. 

International Association of Functional Neurology and Rehabilitation

Carrick Institute for Graduate Studies

American Chiropractic Neurology Board

Journal of Funtional Neurology, Rehabilitation and Ergonomics

Life Functional Neurology Center

Chiropractic Neurology on ABC News Nighline

Hope Restored: Funtional Neurology Serves Humanity

PubMed Health - Migraine Headaches

Sidney Crosby works with Dr. Ted Carrick

Rebuilding Sidney Crosby's Brain

Keystone Chiropractic Neurology

Hi, I’m David B. Sullivan and I’m a board-certified chiropractic neurologist. You might have never heard about that term before, but we’ve been around for quite a while. Chiropractic Neurology is basically about understanding the human brain, how it works, why/how it gets diseased, and how to help make it better without using drugs or surgery. 
I am a founding member of the International Association of Functional Neurology and Rehabilitation (IAFNR). This is the organization that I intend to have my research published through. 
International Assoc. of Functional Neurology and Rehabilitation
Our field has been gaining a lot of exposure in the last few years through some high-profile stories in the news. This type of care was instrumental in the recovery of Pittsburgh Penguin’s star player, Sidney Crosby. It has also been featured on a recent segment of ABC News’ Nightline. This approach to the treatment of neurological disorders has the potential to revolutionize the standard model of care applied to people suffering with neurological diseases. There was even a documentary filmed recently about this type of care. Being a part of that movement, I too am passionate about advancing our understanding and scope, so that we can serve humanity at the highest level possible. 
The founder of this movement, Dr. Frederick Robert Carrick has been quoted as saying: 
“What was once considered a miracle, is [now] a clinical expectation”
I know first hand what he means by this. I, and my colleagues all around the world witness this each week in our clinics. People that have been suffering without hope are finally coming alive again, regaining function and getting back to normal living with functional neurology. 
What we’re doing and why it matters:
Functional neurology is a way to optoimize brain function without the use of drugs or surgery. It is a revolutionary way to care for neurological illness and we are passionate and dedicated to expanding our reach to the patients who need it most. Our ongoing mission is to establish more evidence, support and understanding of exactly how these treatments work, how to apply them best, and how to get this understanding out to the rest of the scientific and healthcare world. 
We need your help in order to carry on this work, and bring this therapy to the rest of the world!! 
We are part of a movement dedicated toward advancing the science, understanding and knowledge of chronic neurological disease. As a whole, we are actively expanding our access to world-class research facilities, equipment and tools, but there is still a large grass roots effort behind this. In essence, clinics like ours are the front line in developing new ideas, hypotheses and approaches which then feed into larger research efforts. Because clinics like ours are 'in the trenches', we have a first-hand perspective on the conditions that real people live with and suffer with. 
Here’s why we need funding and where it will go:
Beyond the humanistic value in this work, research and publishing scientific research takes time, equipment and money. A fair bit of it actually. We are seeking funding of $25,000 in order to advance this effort. 
The funds we raise will go towards purchasing some more sensitive and sophisticated diagnostic, evaluation and treatment equipment to study these therapies in more depth. Our intention is to continue to research these tools so that we understand more completely, what is happening in the brain and why, and how we can use that knowledge for the greatest good of mankind. Our diagnostic equipment and data gathering needs will basically consist of:

Automatic blood pressure cuffs
Pulse oximeter and perfusion indicator
Video nystagmography system
A computer terminal to record video data with
Electric nerve-stimulator devices 
More sensitive scopes and instruments for evaluating nervous system function
Vestibular stimulation apparatus 

Here’s how you can take part in something HUGE:
You have the opportunity here, to be a part of something that could literally end the pain and suffering of millions of people across the world. Think about it- you’re donation to our cause could help end the conditions that thousands or millions of people live with every single day. Your donation could help make the difference between someone living well or suffering needlessly. 
We need your help to make this happen!!
To honor your contributions, we’ve selected a variety of perks to choose from. 
At the most basic level, you’ll receive our undying thanks and appreciation. Higher levels of donation will earn you more personalized thanks as well as some brain related activity books. The PDF version of our initial work will be offered to those who can donate in the mid-ranges, and it only get’s better from there. Subsequent higher levels of donations will earn perks such as being thanked publicly in the acknowledgements of the study, a hard-bound copy of the study, a DVD copy of “Hope Restored: Functional Neurology Serves Humanity”, and even a 1-year membership to the International Association of Functional Neurology and Rehabilitation which also includes 4 quarterly journals. 
If you cannot contribute financially at this time, we understand. But you could still help too!
In lieu of a financial donation, you could help us spread the word about our effort to others so that it might reach people who can. You can also spread the word about Functional Neurology and how this movement is quite literally re-writing the level of care possible for neurological disease. 
Please consider sharing this effort among your contacts, both online and in person. Every person who knows about it can help improve the health of millions of people around the world. If ever there was a chance for you to change the world, this is it. Our hope is that in the years to come, you will see this therapy emerge as a front-line treatment for neurological disease. And you’ll know that you helped make it happen!!
Please use the Indiegogo sharing tools to help get the word out about our project. Help us take away the pain. 
International Association of Functional Neurology and Rehabilitation
Carrick Institute for Graduate Studies
American Chiropractic Neurology Board
Journal of Funtional Neurology, Rehabilitation and Ergonomics
Life Functional Neurology Center
Chiropractic Neurology on ABC News Nighline
Hope Restored: Funtional Neurology Serves Humanity
PubMed Health - Migraine Headaches
Sidney Crosby works with Dr. Ted Carrick
Rebuilding Sidney Crosby's Brain

story:
I don't know how good that image is. I just snagged it from the hundreds of images from my MRI.

 

Story Time

So, here's the deal. About a month and a half ago, I slipped (very slightly) in the shower, and suddenly I couldn't move my right leg or really stand up straight. It was excruciating. I barely made it out of the shower and into clothes. After laying down on my couch and realizing that I couldn't stand back up again, and feeling the pain get worse and worse, I let someone take me to the ER. I had no reflex in my right leg.

After an MRI, they determined that I had degenerative disc disease, and had herniated a disc in my spine (L4-L5), and had another disc that was getting close to doing the same (L3-L4). I was subsequently sent home with some painkillers and muscle relaxers, and set up with an appointment to see a spine surgeon at a neurospine clinic.

For about two weeks, I could barely get off my couch or walk around. Even painkillers and muscle relaxers and heating pads and ice packs couldn't alleviate the pain. While the injury got somewhat better (I can now walk around, at least) the pain is still incredibly persistent, and the functionality in my right leg (as well as my back) is greatly diminished. My foot will sometimes go entirely numb, and there are often jolts of aching pain down my leg, as well as the pain that is nearly always present in my back.

Two weeks ago, I receieved an epidural steroid injection. They shot novacaine into my back, used an xray machine and injected dye to see better, and inserted a large needle filled with a steroid and an anasthetic into the nerve roots attached to my spine. The injection was extremely painful, and incapicitated me for several days. They kept telling me the pain would get worse before it would get better. Well, it did get worse, much worse, for about a week, and then went back to exactly the way it was before the injection.

I am recieving a second injection on Monday, August 6. After that injection, I have to wait two weeks (again, it gets worse before it gets better) and if that doesn't work, I will be referred to a pain management doctor. Surgery is the next step, but they want to wait a little while longer due to the fact that I'm only 22 years old. I also had one appointment with a physical therapist and was told that I should be in physical therapy 3 times a week, which I just couldn't afford.

This injury has been extremely painful and tedious, and extremely expensive. I am 22 years old, on my own, and currently unemployed.

 

What I Need

I really don't need $500 - that's just the minimum amount allowed to create a campaign. My biggest setbacks right now are being able to afford gas to get to all of these appointments, co-pays for the appointments (some are paid for by my parents, but they have almost entirely removed themselves from this situation), and prescription costs.

As of right now, I am not in physical therapy, because I just couldn't afford to make it there and back three times a week. I would really like to go back though, as it not only will help my currently injury, but it will also help prevent future injuries.

I have an injection scheduled on Monday the 6th, a follow-up two weeks later, and an appointment with a pain management specialist shortly after.

I really just want to do anything I can to get this taken care of. It's painful and debilitating, and I just want to be able to lead a more functional and less consistently painful life again.

 

The Impact

If you help me, it would mean the world to me. I've been trying to find work, but with the economy the way it is and having no degree, it's difficult to find work that would accomodate my physical condition right now.
 
 

Other Ways You Can Help

I swear, I don't just want your money! If you think you could help give me rides to appointments, give me some useful tips and pointers to other ways I can help myself, anything at all, it would be greatly appreciated. Things like food are also very appreciated. It's been hard to get by. Also, any money recieved would be put on a visa gift card or something and used exclusively for health purposes! Leftovers would be donated.
 
 
Some Links to Explain What's Going On:
 
http://www.spine-health.com/conditions/degenerative-disc-disease/what-degenerative-disc-disease
 
http://www.spine-health.com/conditions/herniated-disc/lumbar-herniated-disc

story:
Hi my name is Kristy Lockhart and my best friend has been diagnosed with Lyme Disease. It wasnt until this past year that finally she recieved a proper diagnosis after years of being told a different story every time in a medical visit.
I wish to do everything I can to help her. This is a desperate plea to everybody to please help me financially get her back to the U.S.A for another round of treatment.
In Canada proper testing and treatment are not available. The majority of people with Lyme disease are misdiagnosed for years and by the time it is discovered it is almost too late.
The very first visit to the USA that day cost me $1500. Thanks to YOU and your generous donations I was able to provide this for Heather. Monthly treatment (not including her antibiotics) suggested from the lyme doctor is hundreds of dollars on potent specialized probiotics that have to be special ordered, certain vitamins and minerals, supplements as well as a very strict NO yeast/gluten/wheat/yeast/sugar diet. Everyday she has to also juice a variety of greens so her body can absorb the nutrients properly. One teaspoon of sugar/honey/sweetner/etc can suppress Heather's immune system for 6 hours. Also she recieves monthly treatment as well from a wonderful Lyme literate Naturopath.

4 years ago she had a gym membership, walked 5 miles a day, hiked, spent time in nature, and constantly doing photo shoots. Now, she can't walk more than 20 minutes, becomes so fatigued far too quickly, has difficulty breathing, chest pains, migraines, her joints swell up so bad she can't write or type, difficulty folding laundry, doing dishes and playing with her cat. Something in her body is malfunctioning as her entire body is covered in edema and this past year she had to go on heart medication as this disease is affecting her heart now.

This woman means everything to me.  I can't put into words how much I love her. She is an amazing artist/photographer (www.redbubble.com/people/locustgirl) and a genuine pure soul and there's nothing I won't do for her. Meeting someone like this only happens once in a lifetime, and I fear her lifetime will be over soon if her medical treatment is unable to continue.

Donating to this compaign will ensure proper medical care and treatment and lodging while undergoing this care. It doesn't matter if it's $1 or $1000 every little bit helps. Even if you have no $ to donate, please will you post this on various social networking tools to spread the word?

Even while ill, both she and I helped out with other fundraisers (Rideau Valley Wildlife Sanctuary) by donating hundreds of dollars worth of her art to be sold to help treat injured wildlife. She went to college to learn how to take care of the disabled, now she is disabled.

She left home at 15 and she has no blood relatives who can help her, and she hasn't worked for the last 3 years due to being so ill. I am a single woman and the ONLY person who has been helping her for years, please can you help me help her?
There is a serious gap in Canada for testing and treatment of this horrible disease. Recently Elizabeth May (MP) introduced a new bill into parliament detailing how this disease should be dealt with.  Bill C-442 is the name of this bill and on May's website the petition to gather support to get this passed into law is available. Lets band together on this and get the treatment/education here in Canada!! This is good for the future, but my friend needs help IMMEDIATELY.
My best friend, Heather, has seen 50 doctors in the last 4 years (including 3 neurosurgeons, infectious disease doctors, rheumetologists, dermotologists, neurologists) which she was left with no definitive answers as to the root cause of all her symptoms, until now. Lyme disease, if not detected in the early stages becomes chronic lyme and ends up attacking the heart, kidneys and liver.

We are givers and this is very hard to ask for help. To prove this, for certain denominations I will print and mail to you your choices from Heather's photography gallery. If you love wildlife and nature or creative works combining the beautiful female form with nature, you are sure to love Heather King's artwork. Side note: there are some pieces on her site which have a filter on them. Please know that nothing was done for shock value. Heather did darker work in her past as a release from brutal physical and sexual abuse.
Please do not place an order through RedBubble as you will be charged for the prints and you have already generously donated to this campaign. Please use Redbubble as a gallery and email me directly what prints you would like.  Any questions or for a list of the prints you would like, please email me here lockhart_ottawa@hotmail.com


I promise you if you were to meet Heather you would love her almost as much as I do.  I have never met another soul with such an enormous loving heart as hers.
Please helps us
love
Kristy

story:
#IceBucketPorJuan

La familia Valentin se une para apoyar a Juan Sepulveda.  Juan cumplio con el reto de la cubeta de hielo y reto exitosamente a Chayanna y Raymond Arrieta.  Su familia se une en el acto de el #IceBucketChallenge en nombre de Juan...#IceBucketPorJuan - y donamos para apoyar su cuido y calidad de vida.

Juan Sepulveda

Hijo...esposo...padre...cristiano.

Antes de padecer de ALS, Juan fue un trabajador incansable en una dependencia del gobierno y en adicion tenia un grupo que el dirigia en trabajos de construcción, lo q hacia en los fines de semana y durantes horas extras. 

Al enfermarse uno de sus anhelos era ver la boda de su unica hija.  La cual pudo ver gracias a la tecnología - se le proyecto la ceremonia atra vez de video conferencia a su habitación en su hogar. Tambien disfruto la llegada de su primera nieta, la cual recibio en su cama emocionado. 

Juan esta muy presente en la familia y su mente totalmente clara. Recientemente aparecio en CNN Cafe con su hija Marilen creando conciencia sobre ALS y los meritos del #IceBucketChallenge.

Su cuido es extraordinario gracias al amor de sus hijos, esposa y circulo de cuido.  Su familia y su fe es su fortaleza.

ALS

  • www.alsa.org

story:
Who's Sally?

SALLY is a Senior Ambient Living wellness tracker for keeping tabs on your loved ones recent activity without any fuss or bother. An elderly parent (or grandparent) can go about their day in a normal fashion and SALLY will automatically sense and learn their routine. She is like a good Aunt! 

SALLY's data can be reviewed on an Android or iOS smartphone or tablet. Only a select circle of relatives or friends receive real-time updates. The green light means that the individual activity level for the past several days is constant. When there is a deviation (such as no activity during a normal busy time or nightly frequent wake ups) an alert goes out only to those who have access to their wellness status.


I have. My Mom, Shirley, inspired SALLY. What's the most important thing that comes to YOUR MIND when you think about aging parents or grandparents?

To us it is PEACE OF MIND. Knowing that they are A-Okay. Health and WELLNESS is what we are striving to achieve. First at home. Then the world.

My Mom does NOT want an intrusive device SPYING on her! I can't blame her. Shirley, we understand and we really do respect your independence. SALLY is about as obtrusive as our logo. The BUTTERFLY.

And we're not alone in liking Butterflies. One of the most respected B-Corp's in the world - Care2 - shares our sentiments. But better than that, they believe in what we are trying to accomplish, and that gives us hope!

The ABC's of Indiegogo SALLY can be summed simply, (A) introduce SALLY into your parents life, (B) enhance SALLY with a cadre of FRIENDS (accessory products that make SALLY even better) and (C) expand SALLY beyond the crowd to the millions of elderly living in assisted care facilities.

SALLY does not interrupt your parent's (or grandparents's) independent lifestyle. There is nothing to learn. There are no monthly fees. A daily wellness profile is kept in the cloud and can be reviewed at your leisure.

Did you say there are no monthly fees? Yes, we did. And we wish to be crystal clear on this point. SALLY is NOT a subscription model. SALLY is a WYSIWYG (what you see is what you get) model. Plug her in and she goes to work. Bingo! No fees. Ever.

Oh, and one more thing. SALLY will have FRIENDS in the future. 

What are FRIENDS and what kind of FRIENDS will SALLY have? FRIENDS are products that work in conjunction with SALLY. Increasing WELLNESS is the name of their game. They watch over your family so you know they are safe. And only alert you when they sense something is wrong.

A key feature coming soon is voice messaging to notify your parents when they need to take action. A friendly reminder can make all the difference.

A sampling of the FRIENDS offered in the future includes a variety of products, Life-Band, Pill Dispenser, Blood Pressure, Weight Scale, Gas Detector, Respiration Monitor, Fire Alarm and more. For more information zoom down to the FAQ's section. But be sure to zoom back up!

Our VISION is to establish SALLY, expand the Wellness Circle with FRIENDS and ultimately address the elderly seniors residing in Assisted Living Facilities. To achieve our VISION we must start with early success in a much smaller space. Those busy individuals who CARE enough to take action to increase WELLNESS with their aging parents. Without your support we cannot help the many seniors (everybody has parents) at home and at care facilities who could benefit from having SALLY in their life.

Our goal is to start small. In the home. With products that keep your parents safe!

Good ideas need to start where they have the chance to grow. They need care and nourishment. Just like you did when you were small.

Ideas and products need to be time tested. If you care about creating long-term value you need to enlist an army of dedicated people who really care. Apple could never have been Apple without MacHeads. Providing technology is easy. Providing wellness is hard. We need your help to get this right. This is not a geeky gadget. This is real. And you would be helping to provide the maximum well being to the greatest number of seniors. Now that's something we can all feel good about.

Our next step to achieving SALLY VISION is to add FRIENDS. Expanding wellness within the home environment. This will give us a platform to prove the efficacy of our VISION. Once proven we plan to expand way beyond a single home with your parents. SALLY wants to provide Wellness Care to the millions of adults living in various types of assisted  living and care facilities.

The primary places where people live besides their own home as they age are:

With your help we can expand SALLY to reach Beyond the Crowd. For more information about our VISION to expand WELLNESS to Seniors everywhere, be sure to check out our SALLY Community - Let's Work Together section.

Together we can make SALLY stronger (better able to predict and keep senior adults healthy) with FRIENDS, and expansive (getting to everywhere seniors are, home or assisted living, with improved algorithms). Over time, as your SALLY Community grows, the ability to collect and analyze massive amounts of information that benefit every individual within the community becomes a reality. We believe in a better future. For your parents. For everyone's parents.

It takes a village to raise a child. It takes a community to care for the elderly.

We built SALLY for professionals on the go that want or need to be aware of their aging parents condition. The good news is that they live on their own. Independence is great. Hooray! We're all for it. But that can also be bad news. If something goes wrong. Sometimes all you need to see is the green screen on your smartphone or tablet for that peace of mind.

All SALLY needs is a little love from you!

SALLY is our first product aimed at improving senior lifestyles with simple yet effective products. Our team has successfully designed a variety of video and IoT products in the past. Leveraging our capability gives us a 99% chance of technical success on SALLY.

We launched a successful Kickstarter campaign last autumn. The STACK Box was an IoT gateway that was comparable in complexity to SALLY.

The use of funds is primarily for manufacturing costs to fulfill orders. The design and tooling specifications have already been made. If we don't succeed on raising the requisite amount we intend to introduce the product anyways. But if we do a successful rollout of SALLY on Indiegogo, then we plan a continuous rolling rollout of FRIENDS to enhance the value of SALLY.

Why Did We Choose A Butterfly Logo?

The symbol of the butterfly conveys many meanings. The butterfly is loved and admired by the young and the old. Butterflies are delicate, they are the result of a transformation from a caterpillar to become something quite beautiful. With wings they have explored the world. In some ways, they represent ourselves as we age. Exploring and seeing much, but in the process becoming fragile.


Emulating the butterfly by providing products that promote wellness but never intrude on independence is our mission. Butterflies are free and inspiring.

We're Lighting Out For The Frontier and Taking our VISION with us!

So get behind SALLY now to accelerate the arrival of her FRIENDS. Just as you can never have too many good friends, the same hold's true with SALLY.

SALLY works fine without FRIENDS. But with FRIENDS she will be able to provide more wellness. But more than that, acting as companion devices to SALLY, her FRIENDS create a virtuous circle of wellness. The whole is greater than the sum of the parts. Things Fall Together. You can learn more about SALLY's FRIENDS in our FAQs section.

Our longer-term goal is to keep expanding this Virtuous Circle with more and more FRIENDS for SALLY. When the network of people reaches a critical mass we will attain the virtual equivalent of a rocket lifting off from Earth to discover outer space. Suddenly everything changes. What do we mean by that? 

A good question. Fair enough.

To accurately pinpoint problems before they become manifest requires both quality and quantity of data. A variety of key markers along with proper algorithms can predict behavior quite accurately by analyzing data.

But there is a law of diminishing return. In addition to parsing massive amounts of data to create value. To keep making quantum leaps in wellness requires better quality of data. And that's where SALLY's FRIENDS come in.

Early Detection (the other ED) can be the difference between life and death.

SALLY the Wellness Tracker gathers data activity 24/7. She is a peace of mind device that is simple to setup. Just set SALLY down, plug her in let her go to work! The more data SALLY tracks the better she becomes at predicting problems before they become apparent, even to the person at risk.

The more data SALLY tracks the better she becomes. All of the data is saved and stored securely. In both SALLY and the cloud.

What is the cloud? The cloud is a fancy name for a datacenter. For example, Amazon keeps and stores it's data about you on their own private cloud. You cannot view anyone else's information. This is the same thing except now you are in control of access to the data.

Only the approved circle of friends and family members can view it. With the mobile app it can be viewed on a smartphone or tablet virtually anywhere.

With SALLY you can be on your way to a busy conference but still know that your parents or grandparents are safe and sound.

For seniors a change in ambient motion can be a sign of trouble ahead.

SALLY sits on their bedroom dresser and simply learns the activity routine. Most of the time if the daily routine does not change then all is fine.

SALLY is not a medical device.


Stretch Goals


Welcome! Join the SALLY Community

SALLY collects and organizes user experiences to improve her learning algorithm. You can share your experiences with others through our SALLY Community at www.sallyiot.com and help our product evolve.

Our Favorite Comments So Far :

Let’s work together:

We believe in a better future. To achieve that future we plan to improve SALLY's algorithms from big data to make our entire community safer.

Working with experienced health care facilities, our goal is to build communities for the best outcomes when mishaps do occur.

Over time we envision the community becoming smarter and taking the worry about what to do when an accident happens and you are far away.

It’s all about connections. SALLY helps older parents stay connected to their loved ones. No longer will you be in the dark. SALLY pushes an alert if there are any warning signs. A notice will appear on the app of your smartphone or tablet.



Features and Specifications 

SALLY connects to your private cloud via the Internet. The historical data can be accessed, only by those you choose, with a single button from your iOS or Android smartphone or tablet. Don't have internet access, not a problem at all. Visit our FAQs section below for details.

You can analyze your data online through the cloud, anywhere and at anytime!

The TEAM behind SALLY, her FRIENDS & her VISION!


Design and Process

Countdown Timeline

Just the FAQ's, Ma'am.

Hi, I'm SALLY, what would you like to know about me?

My parents are old. They are put off by technology. How can I be sure they will like SALLY?
Good question. Tell Mom and Dad that all they need to do is plug me in.

Does SALLY stand for anything?
Yes, I am a cute name for Senior Ambient Living.

What does a Senior Ambient Living device do?
It is a device that tracks your parent’s motion as they walk by. The ideal place for SALLY to sit is on your parent’s dresser. She should sit at mid-height so she captures their torso. A green lights means the motion is normal. The light will turn amber and then red the further away from normal. The wellness tracker logs each day’s normal walking motion. This data is then sent to the cloud. From the cloud you can check the status of Mom (and/or Dad, or whomever).

Okay, SALLY is on the dresser at mid-height. But where exactly?
SALLY works best when placed on the bedroom dresser with the sensor pointing to a high traffic area. Make sure SALLY is higher than any pet traffic. A wide angle view will produce the best results. Once you find the right position, do not move.

What if my parents don't have access to the internet?
For parents in the USA that lack an online network at home we can propose FreedomPop 3G/4G free solution. SALLY uses minimal broadband bandwidth. Typical usage is less than ten mega-bytes a month.

Will SALLY really bring me peace of mind?
Yes! Say you are on the go and have a business meeting to attend. By simply viewing a smartphone or tablet you can tell your parents status at a glance with the simplest of all symbols. A green dot lets you know everything is fine.

What if the dot is not green?
If the dot is changing color towards red, then you know the wellness tracker is telling you that things are not normal. It could be something as simple as SALLY got jolted and is not viewing at the same angle. Or it could mean something more serious occurred.

Will SALLY contact me if the wellness tracker detects aberrant behavior?
There will not be an S.O.S. in SALLY. She is merely a tracker. An event, such as a fall, does not trigger an action for now. But one of SALLY’s future FRIENDS, the Life-Band (our next product) will send out an S.O.S. signal.

Does SALLY really have FRIENDS?
Not yet. But we are cooking up a whole lot of ideas. We like to call them FRIENDS of SALLY. Any group of FRIENDS can work with SALLY.

What will SALLY's FRIENDS do?
SALLY works in the bedroom where she tracks your parent's daily ambient motion. Her FRIENDS will extend the range to the whole house and beyond. The basic idea is to extend wellness to many aspects of a person's life. Notification of a fall and proper pill medication are primary goals. Beyond that is a consistent way of monitoring healthy vital signs such as respiration, blood pressure and weight. The environment is then included into the mix, fire alarms and gas sensors. And more.

Will SALLY have a lot of FRIENDS?
That depends on you. For right now, there are enough FRIENDS on the drawing board that along with SALLY they could make up a baseball team. This is a good analogy too. Working together as a team, SALLY and her FRIENDS, will keep your parents and grandparents safe and sound. But again, to realize the DREAM requires help from all of you. Our ultimate VISION is to reach out to Assisted Living Facilities and extend the algorithm to Big Data analytics.

Can I choose to add only the FRIENDS that I want?
Of course! To add any one or all of SALLY’s FRIENDS is a snap. SALLY is the queen butterfly who directs all of her FRIENDS data to the cloud.

If I ask nicely, can you give me a sneak preview about SALLY's FRIENDS?
Oh, all right. Since you read this far and have been ever so nice.

Future FRIENDS include a Life-Band (which triggers an S.O.S. when an event, such as a fall takes place). The Life-Band extends the range beyond the house or garden. All of SALLY's FRIENDS communicate to the cloud through SALLY.

Another FRIEND is the Pill Dispenser that ensures that all medications are taken in the right dosage and at the proper time. An audio notification alert is made when your parent is within range that now is the time to take their medicine. As we age, we tend to forget more easily. We believe that one day your Pill Dispenser will become Indispensable, as today are cars and TVs.

A smart Blood Pressure device and a smart Weight Scale are other FRIENDS.

Respiration monitoring, Gas sensors (carbon monoxide) and Fire alarm are on the list. We welcome input suggestions from our Contributors!

SALLY is the hub of a bicycle wheel and the number of spokes that can be added is only limited by the power of imagination. We love Power Laws!

Future FRIENDS from 3rd party partners may connect to SALLY as well.

SALLY is FRIEND friendly! Feel free to contact us with ideas so we can work together. We suspect the best ideas will come from non-technical people.

Bring us your ideas. We will take care of the technology. And share the rewards. If SALLY succeeds we'll need to hire more caring and creative people.

Risks & Challenges

MANUFACTURING: New tooling to manufacture gadgets and ensure reliability is expensive and requires expert knowledge to get it right. Manufacturing partners that you have a long history with is in our mind, necessary and prudent; only through experience can you establish trust.

To minimize risk we're working with manufacturing partners that we have a long track record for quality, on-time delivery and reliability.

PRODUCT ADJUSTMENTS: As our wellness tracker SALLY gets geared up for production, there will likely be some minor adjustments to improve the final product. Pre-production prototypes are made to test and refine the product and allow us to incorporate our adjustments and those suggested by experienced manufacturing partners. We try always to benefit of you the consumer and will let you know exactly how and why any changes are made.

FULFILLMENT: No matter how much thought, care and effort go into the planning of a product, we have learned through hands-on experience to always expect the unexpected. Murphy’s Law is alive and well in the world of manufacturing. Deadlines are missed, machines break and packages get lost in the mail. Any mishap can cause serious delays.

RISK MANAGEMENT: We minimize the risk of one setback having a serious impact on our delivery schedule. Multiple suppliers with years of working together shoulder to shoulder mitigates any serious delay. Our manufacturing partners have known working experience with us to deliver excellent products without delay or sacrificing quality. Obstacles are met head-on and addressed by combining our internal knowledge with their external expertise with the goal of delighting our customers.

Any pledge amount brings us one step closer to achieving our goal. Become part of the SALLY Community, first by checking us out, then by backing us and ultimately by becoming an active participant. Our wellness tracker SALLY is a living product that improves with age! We believe in a better future. Please help us get the word out about SALLY and THANK YOU for your assistance

Other Ways You Can Help

You can always contribute to a great cause by simply referring friends:

  • Step 1 - spread the word through your Facebook contacts

  • Step 2 - with a click your friends will be at our Indiegogo site

  • Step 3 - you can always reach SALLY at www.sallyiot.com

  • And that's all there is to it. Friends that have aging parents will thank you for it. You gave them the best gift they could ever have. Peace of Mind.

Thank You Everyone, We Really Appreciated Your Support!

Partnering with us, together we can build a SALLY Community of people that want to use technology for good. This project was conceived by the need to preserve Shirley's independence after the loss of her beloved husband, Chick.

Our goal is to make sure that all the Shirley's out there in the world are living and loving life while all of their loved ones know that they are safe and sound.

Keeping safe those they love. The peace of mind knowing that there are no problems today or on the horizon. And when they do crop up, as they invariably do, you are prepared to take action.

We want to send a special thank you to all of our alpha-beta testers, guinea pigs, caring customers, wise advisors, trusty mentors, close friends and loving family participants. Without you SALLY would never have happened.
story_txt:
Who's Sally?


SALLY is a Senior Ambient
Living wellness tracker for keeping tabs on your loved ones recent activity
without any fuss or bother. An elderly parent (or grandparent) can go about
their day in a normal fashion and SALLY will automatically sense and learn
their routine. She is like a good Aunt! 
SALLY's data can be reviewed on an Android or iOS
smartphone or tablet. Only a select circle of relatives or friends receive
real-time updates. The green light means that the individual activity
level for the past several days is constant. When there is a deviation (such as
no activity during a normal busy time or nightly frequent wake ups) an alert
goes out only to those who have access to their wellness status.


I have. My Mom, Shirley, inspired SALLY. What's the most
important thing that comes to YOUR MIND when you think about aging parents or
grandparents?
To us it is PEACE OF MIND. Knowing that 
they are A-Okay. Health and WELLNESS is what we are striving to achieve.
 First at home. Then the world.
My Mom does NOT want an intrusive device
 SPYING on her! I can't blame her. Shirley, we understand and we really 
do respect your independence.
SALLY is about as obtrusive as our logo. The BUTTERFLY.
And we're not alone in liking Butterflies. One of the most
respected B-Corp's in the world - Care2 - shares our sentiments. But better
than that, they believe in what we are trying to accomplish, and that gives us
hope!






The ABC's of Indiegogo SALLY can be 
summed simply, (A) introduce SALLY into your parents life, (B) enhance 
SALLY with a cadre of FRIENDS (accessory products that make SALLY even 
better) and (C) expand SALLY beyond the crowd to the millions of elderly
 living in assisted care facilities.
SALLY does not interrupt your parent's 
(or grandparents's) independent lifestyle. There is nothing to learn. 
There are no monthly fees. A daily wellness profile is kept in the cloud
 and can be reviewed at your leisure.



Did you say there are no monthly 
fees? Yes, we did. And we wish to be crystal clear on this point. 
SALLY is NOT a subscription model. SALLY is a WYSIWYG (what you see is 
what you get) model. Plug her in and she goes to work. Bingo! No fees. 
Ever.
Oh, and one more thing. SALLY will have FRIENDS in the future. 
What are FRIENDS and what kind of 
FRIENDS will SALLY have? FRIENDS are products that work in 
conjunction with SALLY. Increasing WELLNESS is the name of their game. 
They watch over your family so you know they are safe. And only alert 
you when they sense something is wrong.
A key feature coming soon is voice 
messaging to notify your parents when they need to take action. A 
friendly reminder can make all the difference.






A sampling of the FRIENDS offered in the
 future includes a variety of products, Life-Band, Pill Dispenser, Blood
 Pressure, Weight Scale, Gas Detector, Respiration Monitor, Fire Alarm 
and more. For more information zoom down to the FAQ's section. But be 
sure to zoom back up!
Our VISION is to establish SALLY, expand
 the Wellness Circle with FRIENDS and ultimately address the elderly 
seniors residing in Assisted Living Facilities. To achieve our VISION we
 must start with early success in a much smaller space. Those busy 
individuals who CARE enough to take action to increase WELLNESS with 
their aging parents. Without your support we cannot help the many 
seniors (everybody has parents) at home and at care facilities who could
 benefit from having SALLY in their life.





Our goal is to start small. In the home. With products that keep your parents safe!
Good ideas
need to start where they have the chance to grow. They need care and
nourishment. Just like you did when you were small.
Ideas and
products need to be time tested. If you care about creating long-term
value you need to enlist an army of dedicated people who really care. Apple could
never have been Apple without MacHeads. Providing technology is easy. Providing
wellness is hard. We need your help to get this right. This is not a geeky
gadget. This is real. And you would be helping to provide the maximum well
being to the greatest number of seniors. Now that's something we can all feel
good about.


Our next step to achieving SALLY VISION 
is to add FRIENDS. Expanding wellness within the home environment. This 
will give us a platform to prove the efficacy of our VISION. Once proven
 we plan to expand way beyond a single home with your parents. SALLY 
wants to provide Wellness Care to the millions of adults living in 
various types of assisted  living and care facilities.
The primary places where people live besides their own home as they age are:







With your help we can expand SALLY to 
reach Beyond the Crowd. For more information about our VISION to expand 
WELLNESS to Seniors everywhere, be sure to check out our SALLY Community
 - Let's Work Together section.

(better able to predict and keep senior adults healthy) with FRIENDS,

 matter how much thought, care and effort go into the planning of a 
product, we have learned through hands-on experience to always expect 
the unexpected. Murphy’s Law is alive and well in the world of 
manufacturing. Deadlines are missed, machines break and packages
get lost in the mail. Any mishap can cause serious delays.
RISK
 MANAGEMENT: We
minimize the risk of one setback having a serious impact on our delivery
 schedule. Multiple suppliers with years of working together shoulder to
 shoulder mitigates any serious delay. Our manufacturing partners have 
known working experience with us to deliver excellent products without 
delay or sacrificing quality. Obstacles are met head-on and addressed by
 combining our internal knowledge with their external expertise with the
 goal of delighting our customers.
Any
 pledge amount brings us one step closer to achieving our goal. Become 
part of the SALLY Community, first by checking us out, then by backing 
us and ultimately by becoming an active participant. Our wellness 
tracker SALLY is a living product that improves with age! We believe in a
 better future. Please help us get the word out about SALLY and THANK 
YOU for your assistance

Other Ways You Can Help
You can always contribute to a great cause by simply referring friends:

Step 1 - spread the word through your Facebook contacts
Step 2 - with a click your friends will be at our Indiegogo site
Step 3 - you can always reach SALLY at www.sallyiot.com
And that's all there is to it. Friends that have aging parents 
will thank you for it. You gave them the best gift they could ever have.
 Peace of Mind.


Thank You Everyone, We Really Appreciated Your Support!
Partnering
 with us, together we can build a SALLY Community of people that want to
 use technology for good. This project was conceived by the need to 
preserve Shirley's independence after the loss of her beloved husband, 
Chick.
Our goal is to make sure that all the Shirley's out
there in the world are living and loving life while all of their loved ones
know that they are safe and sound.


Keeping safe those they love. The peace of mind knowing
that there are no problems today or on the horizon. And when they do crop up,
as they invariably do, you are prepared to take action.
We want to send a special thank you to all of our
alpha-beta testers, guinea pigs, caring customers, wise advisors, trusty
mentors, close friends and loving family participants. Without you
SALLY would never have happened.

story:
Would like to buy Nextion HMI afther the campaign? 

Please see here:  http://imall.iteadstudio.com/display/nextion.html



What is Nextion

Nextion is a Seamless Human Machine Interface (HMI) solution that provides a control and visualisation interface between a human and a process, machine, application or appliance. Nextion is mainly applied to IoT or consumer electronics field. It is the best solution to replace the traditional LCD and LED Nixie tube.

This solution includes hardware part - a series of TFT boards and software part - Nextion editor.  Nextion TFT board uses only one serial port to do communicating. Let you get rid of the wiring trouble. We notice that most engineers spend much time in application development but get unpleasant results. In this situation, Nextion editor has mass components such as button, text, progress bar, slider, instrument panel etc. to enrich your interface design. And the drag-and-drop function ensures that you spend less time in programming, which will reduce your 99% development workloads. With the help of this WYSIWYG editor, GUI designing is a piece of cake.

We believe that your dozen days developing a complex HMI can be done in couple hours by using Nextion.  


If You Are...

Maker/Developer – Worry about spending time in learning programming the TFT when you start to undertake an interactive interface design? Using Nextion editor, you can drag-and-drop any component in the editor, designing the interface with less programming.

Manufacturer – Seeking suitable small TFT for your new project? Don’t hesitate to try Nextion. Nextion provides a complete, high-quality display features for developing advanced graphical embedded applications in a smaller RAM, lower frequency MCU and a lower cost even.



Why Nextion

Your Nextion: change the way you interface

Today’s marketplace is all about how you interface—with customers, suppliers and your machinery. Nextion offers a new and easy way to interface. Available in 2.4", and 4.3" models, Nextion is a true analog touchscreen operator interface with programmable function buttons for the most robust applications, using Nextion makes interfacing with your machinery easier than ever. 

A very cost-effective solution

Getting the job done right at the right price— Nextion is the operator interface solution you’ve been waiting for. Nextion is designed and manufactured in Shenzhen, China. Owing to its perfect supply chain and relatively low labor cost, we can provide low-price but functionally competitive products.



A Better Solution than Ever

  1. Provide some small size TFTs that absent in the market.
  2. Character string commands, ease the debugging difficulty.
  3. Objective-oriented controlling method. Nextion supports the commands not only to draw points or lines, but also to control most attributes of the components and materials.
  4. You can control the objects in a demo through serial port commands by external MCU even the demo has already been downloaded and demonstrated on Nextion screen.
  5. Fully functional software. 
  • A WYSIWYG editor. User can drag-and-drop any component in the editor to simplify your interface design.
  • Rich set of components. Many general elements in HMI design have been packed into controls, users can evoke them directly.
  • Custom component. Users can design your own components to meet your demand. 

Nextion Tutorial: Weather Station



Nextion Editor Support - A Project done in 30 minutes



Learn more

Learn more

Learn more

Want to know how to make all above components in Nextion Editor? Learn it from our tutorials!

Arduino Project

Tell you what! Nextion Arduino library is on the way. The library will be very easy to use and simplify your development debugging when you use Nextion in your arduino project. See how we use it with Arduino to make a progress bar & button showing on Nextion 2.4".

Arduino Progress Bar tutorial, click here to learn more.


Arduino Button tutorial, click here to learn more.


All About Sharing

Nextion Editor features a "custom component" sharing function. Users make your own custom components, and they can be shared on the cloud for friends or workmates downloading. By sharing, the teamwork will be enhanced and working efficiency will be improved.


All About Font Editing

Text can be personalized. Nextion Editor support Chinese and English fonts so far. As long as you have installed the font that you are fond of in computer, you can use it to personalize your content in text components.


What Else Nextion Can Do?


Help Us Get Nextion To Programers

WE ARE ACTIVE IN THE FOLLOWING SOCIAL WEBSITES, FIND AND JOIN US. ANY QUESTION, DON'T HESITATE TO ASK!

FACEBOOK: We open a forum on our facebook page, tell us what's your ideas.

TWITTER: Use hashtag #nextion to tweet what you think about Nextion, so that we can search you and answer your question on twitter.


Perks


Timeline


FAQ

Q: Can I use Nextion as a common TFT LCD?

A: Yes. Nextion supports GUI commands including drawing a dot or a line, filling solid color, showing a picture etc. You can connect the MCU through UART, and let the MCU control Nextion via GUI commands.

Q: Is Nextion touchable?

A: Yes. Nextion adopts resistive screen, supporting single-touch point, not support the multi-touch like capacitive screen. 

Q: What’s the refresh rate of Nextion TFT boards?

A: The refresh rate of Nextion 2.4” is controlled by GPU, the speed is 80ms per frame. The refresh rate of Nextion 4.3” is controlled by GPU and RGB buffer, the speed is 20ms per frame.

Q: Can I ask you to customize the layout and location hole of Nextion TFT boards?

A: Yes. We provide custom Nextion. But only offer the customization of Nextion layout, location hole, and interface.

Q: Except 2.4” and 4.3”, what else screen size you provide?

A: We now only provide 2.4 and 4.3 size. We will develop Nextion 2.8” and 3.2” if this project is very welcome on Indiegogo. If everything goes well, it is expected that they will be on the market in October. Before then, we only produce and sell Nextion 2.4” and 4.3”

Q: How many OS does Nextion Editor support?

A: Only Windows support now. If the crow-funding successes,  we will develop multi-platform Nextion Editor Version to support Linux and Mac. It may come out in later of 2015.

Q: Can you ensure a steady supply of Nextion?

A: We guarantee to provide a steady supply of high-quality, low-cost Nextion 2.4” and 4.3”. If we change the manufacture and use new TFT, we guarantee that the display area and control method are in the same but a slightly change in the appearance.

Q:If I upgrade Nextion Editor to a new version, will it affect my project I did before?

A: Of course no. We guarantee the new version is compatible to the old version seamlessly. In this case, you don’t need to worry about the compatibility problem.


Note:
This is a Fixed Funding. If we don't reach our goal, our contributors will get refunded.

story:
When I first heard about female genital mutilation (FGM), I was heart-broken.  A hundred and thirty million girls have actually had to endure this excruciating and humiliating experience---plus the recurring pain and serious health problems all their lives!  In 1997, I decided to go to Mali, one of the poorest countries in the world, where roughly 90% of women have suffered FGM---most when they were just little girls.

FGM is the very painful and harmful practice of cutting away parts of the external female genitalia, usually without anesthesia.  When I saw photos of serious FGM complications for the first time, I fainted.  The trauma to these girls’ and women’s bodies is that bad.

          Terrified young girl awaits her turn. Girls usually cannot escape FGM.

I wanted to help stop FGM. And I hope you will want to help stop FGM, too.


Sini Sanuman – “Healthy Tomorrow” in the Bambara language of Mali

During my fourth trip to Mali, in 2002, along with Malian partners, I started the group Sini Sanuman and the next year I founded Healthy Tomorrow in the U.S.  These groups work together to fight against FGM. 

Healthy Tomorrow is our American non-profit that raises awareness and funds to send to Sini Sanuman to do our life-saving work.


Working from the grassroots level up to the national legislature

Working in Mali, Sini Sanuman organizes public meetings to discuss FGM with the whole community. We work to educate and to change public attitudes about cutting girls from “it’s the age-old custom of our people” to “we would never do that to our daughters”.  It is a major cultural shift and has to happen from the ground up, in villages and in cities, one neighborhood at a time.

       Ceremony at Moussala, with 2 ex-excisers  --- our first village to stop FGM!

Sini Sanuman has convinced 11 villages to stop excising their girls.  The village chief's role is critical; many have recruited neighboring villages to stop doing FGM as well.  Working with the Women's Ministry, we started the national list of these villages to show the progress of the anti-FGM movement around the country.

Sometimes our staff is asked to go out on emergency missions, like the time the village chief of Tamala, one of our villages that have abandoned the practice, called the office of Sini Sanuman to say that large excision ceremonies were being planned in 3 neighboring villages. Our president, Siaka Traoré, and the village chief made a whirlwind tour of the villages and saved 64 girls.  Two villages had no girls cut, and in the 3rd village, most were not cut.  

"We are so happy not to be cut!" Girls of Missalabougou, Mali, sing at a ceremony when their village pledges to stop FGM

Often Sini Sanuman staff are asked to intervene by people who are arguing with family members who want to have a girl excised.  Sometimes they show those graphic photos that made me faint! They also quote modern religious leaders saying it is not a duty to have girls cut.

Much of Malian culture revolves around music and dancing. We sing and play anti-FGM songs and dance as part of our outreach; and we hold a big dance celebration when a village gives up FGM. This is the most fun part of our work!

                            

      Singing and dancing in the village of Soba, Mali, when they renounced FGM

Through many face-to-face meetings, Sini Sanuman has collected over 60,000 signatures on the Pledge Against Excision, a promise never to have a girl cut. The Pledge Against Excision will be presented at the National Assembly, to try to get a law enacted against FGM. 

            

                        Man signs the Pledge Against Excision in his village


Reaching Hearts and Minds Across the Region

Sini Sanuman puts music videos on TV to reach millions of Malians (and neighboring countries) about FGM.  Famous artists such as Adama Yalomba and Kandia Kouyate sing in these videos.  One features 17 women who used to excise girls, throwing their knives away after Sini Sanuman convinced them to stop. They are singing with joy about their decision, and showing their new professions with pride (cooking, fabric dyeing, farming).  

                                  Ex-excisers proud of having stopped cutting girls


Sini Sanuman puts anti-FGM songs on the radio by famous Malian singers such as Ami Koita, Kandia Kouyate, Neba Sola and Fantani Toure.  (Producing “Stop Excision” was one of our first projects in Mali).  Every song reaches thousands of listeners in a country where many people rely on the radio for most of their news.

                                          

                                 Album cover from "Stop Excision" music CD

We put up posters around Bamako (the capital city) and beyond, that show famous Malians against FGM, and full-size billboards around the city.  Another poster shows a terrified girl about to be cut and explains the many problems caused by FGM.


Voices of Change in an Ancient Culture

Over 150 excisers have given up the practice on the basis of education from Sini Sanuman.  Many of them are our most passionate spokespeople.  We give them Certificates of Honor for stopping excising, and many put these on their wall as a prized possession.

               

          A former exciser turning her knife in to the mayor in a public ceremony


Religious leaders are an important part of our campaign. Many now preach against FGM in their mosques. Famous preachers’ quotes are on our anti-FGM handout. 

"The Club of Whole Women"

Many parents have their girls cut because they're afraid someone will insult them by calling them un-excised. (For many centuries this was a real slur in Malian society).  To counteract this concern, Sini Sanuman has a Club of Whole Women who have appeared on the radio saying they're proud to be un-cut.  One of our music videos begins with someone insulting the singer, but she turns it around by saying that she likes being whole, and her international superstar husband gives her a big thumbs-up.

Billboard with famous Malians. "A girl's body is sacred. Leave girls whole."


How Can I Help Save Girls from FGM? 

$370 buys a billboard for a year, showing famous Malians opposed to FGM

$100 puts a music video on TV for 4 million people to see

$35 pays for a community meeting to spread our message

$25 pays for a meeting with an exciser or a religious leader to get them on board

$5 puts a song from "Stop Excision" on a radio station where thousands will hear it

And – please share our story on your social media accounts!


Outcomes:

·  Girls spared the agonizing ordeal of FGM!

·  Women healthier and therefore happier and living longer, more productive lives.

·  More mothers and babies will survive childbirth (FGM greatly increases mortality).

·  Pain, suffering, and infections prevented: most of the health consequences of FGM go untreated in this poverty-stricken region. Money saved for people who do get treated.

·  A law against FGM so that people who oppose it can claim that the law is on their side and so that some people are put in jail to dissuade others from practicing FGM.

Ending FGM brings so many benefits!  Please help us make it happen!

Thank you so much!

Susan McLucas, president of Healthy Tomorrow and secretary general of Sini Sanuman

P.S. Want to learn more? Visit www.StopExcision.net

story:
As many of you may know, I have been fortunate enough to work with VIDA Volunteer (www.vidavolunteertravel.org) for the past 3 years. VIDA is a non-for-profit organization that provides free medical care to rural communities in Nicaragua and Guatemala. 

This year I have decided to combine my passion for providing access to healthcare with my love for sports. On February 15th, I will take part in a 16-km race in honor of all the patients we will be caring for through VIDA Volunteer. 

On March 7th, I will be returning to Nicaragua with 17 peers. We will meet a team of licensed physicians and interpreters and set up mobile health clinics to provide basic medical care to several underserved, rural communities in partnership with VIDA.

100% of all donations will go towards funding the trip. This will allow us to provide medical supplies to communities that need it the most. Any donation is greatly appreciated no matter how big or small!  

The Impact

VIDA’s Medical Program is designed to help impoverished communities in Central America, while giving volunteers around the world an interactive, cultural and engaging experience that will help them become better professionals and life-long volunteers.

We serve rural communities with little to no access to healthcare who are in great need of attention and medications.

We offer public health screenings and education, free medical attention, free medications to patients and most importantly, we offer compassion, care, comfort and help to those who are less fortunate and who need it the most.

Currently in Nicaragua, there are only 0.37 physicians per 1,000 persons. In addition, the government can only afford to spend $355 per person on healthcare, with little of it going to remote communities. Please help us address this issue! 

Donations suggestions:

$40 buys a stethoscope 

$30 buys a first aid kit 

$25 buys a box of sterile gloves 

$20 buys prenatal vitamins for an expecting mother 

$15 buys lice treatment for a family of four 

$10 buys a 2 month supply of vitamins for a child
story_txt:
As many of you may know, I have been fortunate enough to work with VIDA Volunteer (www.vidavolunteertravel.org) for the past 3 years. VIDA is a non-for-profit organization that provides free medical care to rural communities in Nicaragua and Guatemala. 

This year I have decided to combine my passion for providing access to healthcare with my love for sports. On February 15th, I will take part in a 16-km race in honor of all the patients we will be caring for through VIDA Volunteer. On March 7th, I will be returning to Nicaragua with 17 peers. We will meet a team of licensed physicians and interpreters and set up mobile health clinics to provide basic medical care to several underserved, rural communities in partnership with VIDA.100% of all donations will go towards funding the trip. This will allow us to provide medical supplies to communities that need it the most. Any donation is greatly appreciated no matter how big or small!  

    The Impact 

VIDA’s Medical Program is designed to
help impoverished communities in Central America, while giving volunteers
around the world an interactive, cultural and engaging experience that will help
them become better professionals and life-long volunteers.
We serve rural communities with little to
no access to healthcare who are in great need of attention and medications.
We offer public health screenings and
education, free medical attention, free medications to patients and most
importantly, we offer compassion, care, comfort and help to those who are
less fortunate and who need it the most.Currently in Nicaragua, there are only 0.37 physicians per 1,000 persons. In addition, the government can only afford to spend $355 per person on healthcare, with little of it going to remote communities. Please help us address this issue! Donations suggestions:$40 buys a stethoscope $30 buys a first aid kit $25 buys a box of sterile gloves $20 buys prenatal vitamins for an expecting mother $15 buys lice treatment for a family of four $10 buys a 2 month supply of vitamins for a child

story:
UPDATE:  The iRDDU Has Been Released!  Please see this link:

http://www.irddu.com and follow the links for the download.  Thank you to everyone who supported and contributed this effort.  The iRDDU is a FREEWARE program because of you!

Summary of the Program

The iRacing motorsport racing simulation is a popular and ultra realistic racing simulation with over 35 thousand active members living worldwide.  Simulated PC auto racing is an activity enjoyed by millions of players, and iRacing offers the most realistic auto racing experience found short of actually being on a real life race track.

Unfortunately, it lacks an option which many who enjoy the service would want.  Heretofore, there has existed no option for some users who may want to monitor critical engine and other data on a screen separate from the one(s) displaying the racing which is not pricey or which requires another, external hardware device.  Moreover, some users actually cannot see their gauge displays for the reason that those with multiple screens may not be able to fit into them their car's virtual dashboard when the most realistic view settings are used.

The iRacing Data Display Unit, iRDDU for short, will give the iRacing enthusiast exactly what is lost under many circumstances...and it's FREE!  It will function on any monitor, and many sim racing fans have multiple monitors connected to their PC system.

We’re proud to have assembled a team of motivated, enthusiastic and EXPERIECNED programmers who have all the skills needed to make this program a reality.  Our collective sim racing experiences spans many decades.  Our lead developer was very active with creating a very popular program for Grand Prix Legends - iRacing's progenitor - and his program is even remaining in service with the most loyal GPL fans.

Paul Thurston developed GEM+ for Grand Prix Legends.  GEM+ was used at its height by more than 10,000 users – a time when sim racing started becoming popular and was a program which allowed Grand Prix Legends users virtually unlimited control over their software settings and parameters.  It not only made the title more efficient, but it also gave the fan base a tool with which they could enjoy their racing experience that much more fully.  GEM+ still remains in active service for some – many years later.

Paul’s role as the Executive Developer and lead programmer of the Data Display Unit for iRacing ensures that the program will deliver precisely as promised, and it’s his effort which has brought this project to reality.  Indeed there is no better man for the task.

Derek Speare Designs is a sim racing component manufacturer who has thousands of customers worldwide.  The DSD name is known by many sim racers to deliver quality, value and service unparalleled.  Derek Speare is the Program Facilitator and one of the Corporate Benefactors of the iRDDU effort.  Derek’s dedication to service is unmatched, and all who know him know he delivers.  Derek’s role in the project is not for compensation, and as a Corporate Benefactor, he has pledged his own funds as such to support the development process.

Why Indiegogo?

Indiegogo is an excellent venue for which to generate investment capital and exposure for the iRDDU.  The iRDDU will be freeware, and since programmers must be paid, there is every reason to ask for the community to support the development of it. 

  • 4250 USD is required to pay programming staff and to develop the program to reality;
  • DSD is a proven long term performer with a track record for excellence;
  • Paul Thurston's track record speaks for itself

What Does Contributing Do?

Our contributors will receive out gratitude and know that they have made a valuable program a reality.  Those who contribute at various levels will receive certain benefits:

  • A 10 dollar contribution will earn our love and admiration and allow you to sleep soundly knowing that you will soon be receiving a link to download the iRDDU program AHEAD of the official release;
  • A 65 dollar contribution will enroll you into the official beta testing program;
  • For 500 dollars you will become one of our "Corporate Benefactors" and for that we will prominently display your logo on the iRDDU screen so others using the program will know that you support their efforts.

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word - tell your friends - tell anyone who likes iRacing that you like the iRacing Data Display Unit!

Useful Links

http://www.iracing.com

http://derekspearedesigns.com

story:
The Story

I can trace it back to my first Walk for Life. A seed was planted, and then when I got a job with Live Action, my passion for the pro-life movement began. Since then I've worked with organizations including:

  • 40 Days for Life
  • Juan Diego Women's Center
  • Live Action News

This summer I have the opportunity to work with RealOptions, a pregnancy medical clinic in San Jose, CA which provides women and families with the resources and care they need to make life-affirming choices.

That's Where You Come In

To make up for the lost income incurred by taking this internship and to help me pay for my college tuition in the fall, I'm asking you to participate in my pro-life work by supporting me. Your financial support enables me to be part of this mission work within my community. It would be a great blessing to me if I were able to graduate from college without major debt restricting my future job choices. In the future, I would like to be able to choose a high impact job in the pro-life field, over a high paying job in another.

This summer, I will be working with church and community leaders to build partnerships and to create awareness for the services of RealOptions under the leadership of the Sr. Director of Community Outreach, Cecilia Bynum.

RealOptions is a non-profit 501(c)3 recognized for its quality of care by providing information, professional medical services, and practical support to women and men facing unplanned pregnancies, prevention education to students and post-abortion services to those seeking hope help and healing since 1981. RealOptions is a life-affirming medically licensed abortion alternative clinic in Santa Clara County. They are devoted to caring for women physically, emotionally, and spiritually. All services are free of charge, confidential, and provided without government funding.

Check out their website and Facebook page for more information on RealOptions.

The Need

I am specifically fundraising for $9,750. This would offset the 90 days of lost income from accepting the unpaid internship, it would provide me a small stipend to cover room and board, car and gas, health insurance and cell phone, and other incidentals, and, most importantly, it would go a long way towards helping me pay for my fall tuition at Benedictine College.

How to Help

If you're not able to support me financially, or if you'd like to get more involved, here's what you can do:

  • Pray! Keep all those who work in the pro-life movement in your prayers, and this campaign too.
  • Spread the word. Please post and write about this campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and whatever other social media platforms you use!
  • Visit my blog to follow my work.

Check out the Gallery for some videos showing the different ranges and some demonstrations.

GoodMorning Crowdfunding Project of the Day!

To show your friends and family click here to go to our sharing page



Please pass on our message by clicking here to go to our sharing page.


Product Pictures (there will be some changes to the waistband)

Boxer Briefs - 360 (Available in Blue or Black)

These are for men who like it close and snug in the underwear region. They are perfect for wearing under loose fitting jeans or work trousers. Made from a jersey material this design gives you ultimate EM shielding with a snug, yet comfortable fit.

The Electromagnetic shielding in this product will block at least 99.99% of the radiation coming from any of your wireless devices all around the body giving you 360° of protection.


Boxer Briefs - 180 (Available in Blue or Black)

These are for men who like it close and snug in the underwear region. They are perfect for wearing under loose fitting jeans or work trousers. Made from a jersey material this design gives you ultimate EM shielding with a snug, yet comfortable fit.

The Electromagnetic shielding in this product will block at least 99.99% of the radiation coming from any of your wireless devices over the front of your body giving you 180° of protection


Trunks - 360  (Available in Blue or Black)

These small tight trunks are perfect for men who want the tight fit of boxer briefs but no underwear lines on their thighs. Perfect to be warn under tight fitting trousers or if you want to keep everything in place whilst competing in sports. Made from a jersey material these trunks ensure a tight fit with the right amount of stretch for comfort,

The Electromagnetic shielding in this product will block at least 99.99% of the radiation coming from any of your wireless devices giving you 360° of protection.



Trunks - 180 (Available in Blue or Black)

These small tight trunks are perfect for men who want the tight fit of boxer briefs but no underwear lines on their thighs. Perfect to be warn under tight fitting trousers or if you want to keep everything in place whilst competing in sports. Made from a jersey material these trunks ensure a tight fit with the right amount of stretch for comfort and full EM shielding.

The Electromagnetic shielding in this product will block at least 99.99% of the radiation coming from any of your wireless devices over the front half of your body giving 180° of protection



Duty and other Taxes for International delivery

If you are having your perks shipped to another country you will need to check to see if import duties or taxes are applicable.
