story:
Anna vient d'avoir 47 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de deux enfants de 15 et 16 ans. Depuis dix ans, elle lutte courageusement contre un cancer du sein qui a récidivé en métastases osseuses.  Jusqu'à maintenant elle a réussi à faire mentir toutes les statistiques en prolongeant son espérance de vie au delà des pronostics. Anna est une force de la nature, un véritable rayon de soleil dans la vie de sa famille et de ses amis et cela, malgré les douleurs intenables qu'elle endure en silence, jour après jour depuis des années. Un inconnu qui la croiserait dans la rue ne pourrait jamais deviner qu'elle est malade. 

Pourtant, en septembre dernier, son état de santé s'est beaucoup dégradé. Elle a dû entreprendre une série de traitements très agressifs qui ont beaucoup détérioré sa qualité de vie. Les effets secondaires sont nombreux et parfois intolérables. Malgré tout, elle ne baisse pas les bras. Elle s'accroche à la vie de toutes ses forces et continue de sourire pour l'amour de ses enfants, de son amoureux, de sa famille et de ses nombreux amis. Je sais que certains jours elle a l'impression d'avoir épuisé toutes ses ressources. Elle ne sait plus où puiser le courage pour continuer. Son corps n'en peut plus et réagit de plus en plus mal aux traitements conventionnels.

Anna est une vraie passionnée de cuisine. Depuis plusieurs années, elle est convaincue de pouvoir améliorer son état de santé en apportant d'importants changements à son alimentation. Elle a tout essayé ou presque : trois jeunes à l'eau, des cures de jus vert et j'en passe. Pour garder le moral, elle marche 70 km par semaine en faisant fi du mal silencieux qui gruge sa colonne vertébrale.  Elle nous épate tous!

Ses proches savent qu'elle rêve depuis longtemps de s'offrir une cure santé à l'institut Hippocrates de Floride pour aider son corps à mieux supporter les traitement à venir, mais le coût de cette aventure dépasse largement ses moyens. Récemment, elle en a parlé à une amie et ancienne collègue de travail.  Touchée par ses confidences, celle-ci a eu la bonne idée de lui organiser un concert bénéfice afin de recueillir des fonds pour l'aider à réaliser son rêve. 

Le projet a été lancé sur les réseaux sociaux le 7 septembre. La nouvelle se propage à une vitesse folle et le nombre de participants confirmés ne cesse d'augmenter chaque jour. Les médias locaux se sont mis de la partie pour raconter cette formidable histoire d'amitié et de solidarité. Une véritable vague d'amour pour cette ex-enseignante d'espagnol appréciée de tous, forcée de prendre sa retraite bien avant l'heure. 

Si vous ne pouvez être présents au concert du 23 octobre à l'école secondaire de l'Île de Gatineau, vous pouvez nous aider à atteindre l'objectif fixé en faisant un don au montant de votre choix ici même. Merci à l'avance de votre générosité.  

« Caminante, no hay camino. Se hace camino al andar. »  La citation préférée d'Anna. Cela signifie essentiellement qu'il n'y a pas de chemin tracé d'avance pour chacun d'entre nous. Nous devons le tracer nous même en marchant.

story:
Evelyn is the personal fresh air guide that measures the air quality in your immediate surroundings all in real-time. By communicating with your smart phone Evelyn can warn you if air quality is low, direct you to areas with safer air and provide an overview of the quality of air you breathed in on any given day. 


Air pollution is estimated to cause 7 million premature deaths each year around the world. Among the 6 common air pollutants, NO2 and O3 are mainly created by vehicles. Individuals who spend time on or near major roadways can experience short-term NO2 exposure considerably higher than others. Scientific evidence links short-term NO2 exposure – 30 minutes to 24 hours – with adverse respiratory effects including increased respiratory symptoms in people with asthma. Also, patients with pre-existing respiratory diseases could be at increased risk of adverse effects to ozone exposure.




Every country has air pollution monitoring agencies that can alert you if there is a severe air pollution risk. However, it is impossible for these agencies to warn each individual of the risks in their surroundings. Evelyn is the personal fresh air guide that can warn YOU of YOUR immediate surroundings and guide you to safer and cleaner air.   






Each bit of data sent by a member of the Evelyn Community will be synced to the Evelyn Air Quality Data System in order to create a comprehensive database that tracks real-time air pollution conditions. Synced with Google maps, you can monitor what air conditions are like anywhere in the world. When we have acquired enough data, the data system will also be capable of predictive analysis for future air conditions. It is through your help that the Evelyn Air Quality Data System will meet its world changing potential!

Be a part of the community that helps find clean air for everybody!



<EVELYN Server Architecture>


< PROTOTYPE 1 >

< PROTOTYPE 2 >

Evelyn’s PCB (printed circuit board) is equipped with NO2, O3, UV, and Temperature and Humidity sensors. These combined create a comprehensive sensor for Air Quality monitoring. Over years of testing, the sensors have undergone multiple re-designs to ensure the quality and effectiveness of Evelyn. In its current form, Evelyn’s sensors are characterized by fast detection and low power consumption. All of these sensors have been installed onto a PCB that is the smallest design of its kind!






Q: Can Evelyn be used without the pouch?

A: Yes. Though carrying it may be a little uncomfortable Evelyn can be used without the pouch

Q: Which sensors are Evelyn equipped with?

A: Evelyn is equipped with NO2, O3, UV, Temperature & Humidity Sensors

Q: How large is Evelyn?

A: Evelyn is 47 x 66 x 12 (mm)

Q: How far from development is the Evelyn Air Quality Data System?

A: The server architecture is already in development and the Evelyn Air Quality Data System should be up and running soon after the conclusion of the Indiegogo Campaign.

Q: Are there different color options for the pouch?

A: There are no other options currently but new colors can be an option in the future.

story:
NEW PERKS FOR VALENTINE'S DAY UNLOCKED!

 

Have you ever- Felt sleepless every night? Wasted lots of time and money on insomnia treatment? Needed to get rid of the radiation from electronic devices? Our original objective was to develop a product to help family members and friends who were suffering from sleep problems. During our research, we made the decision to design the iWhale to foster a more natural way to a better night's sleep. 

We believe health-beneficial products should be in harmony with nature. They should also be user-friendly, simple to use and affordable.

As we know, a relaxing spa treatment promotes a good night’s sleep. Our research indicates that human’s olfactory sense can send a signal to the limbic system, which controls emotions and higher mental functions. Also, many studies show that lavender essential oil can influence the length of Alpha-wave activity (relaxation) in our brains, relaxing people rapidly. The theory perfectly matches our respect of nature. With excitement, the idea of iWhale was born.

We hope iWhale can deliver a happy and natural life style. With the power of essential oil released, iWhale will improve your sleep, your quality of life and your future outlook.

 

Sleep impacts almost everything in your life. iWhale is an ultrasonic essential oil diffuser that releases an aromatic mist into the air and optimizes air composition to help you fall asleep fast. It not only improves your sleep quality, but also helps to rejuvenate your skin and boost your immune system. Start your day off perfectly after a good night's sleep ... feel energetic and look your best.

 

The application of 3Mhz™ gives birth to the most delicate and highly absorbent essential oil. 

When iWhale is working, the frequency of its ultrasound vibration is millions of times per second. iWhale atomizes the water and essential oil into extremely fine mist particles in nanometer, which is smaller than 1/10 of the diameter of the pores of human skin. In this way, the mist can reach to the base of your skin and makes you look younger and more energetic.

 Relax with soothing essential oil aromas iWhale performs best with essential oils. For purity and maximum healthful benefits, we recommend essential oils verified by the International Fragrance Association (IFA), Aromatherapy Trade Council (ATC), National Oilheat Research Alliance (NORA), the Registration, Evaluation and Authorization of Chemicals (REACH), or the Food and Drug Administration (FDA). A qualified oil clearly shows its ingredients, origin and Latin name of the plant, company or factory, series number and pureness. Recommended essential oils for sleep and relaxation include:

BACKGROUND: Several aromatherapy studies are published in the National Center for Biotechnology Information (NCBI):

“Readily available aromatherapy treatments appear to be effective and promote sleep. ” － Hwang E1, Shin S.<The effects of aromatherapy on sleep improvement: a systematic literature review and meta-analysis.>

"According to the study results, it can be concluded that the lavender fragrance had a beneficial effect on insomnia and depression in female college students. "－Taehan Kanho Hakhoe Chi.<Effects of lavender aromatherapy on insomnia and depression in women college students>.

"Lavender essential oil increased quality of sleep and reduced level of anxiety in patients with coronary artery disease."－Karadag E1, Samancioglu S2, Ozden D3, Bakir E4.<Effects of aromatherapy on sleep quality and anxiety of patients.>

"After 12 weeks of lavender aromatherapy, midlife women with insomnia have shown improvement in the quality of their sleep."－ Li-Wei Chien, Su Li Cheng and Chi Feng Liu<The Effect of Lavender Aromatherapy on Autonomic Nervous System in Midlife Women with Insomnia>

iWhale is the most eco-friendly ultrasonic aroma essential oil diffuser with the first adoption of 4.5W/5V low energy-consumption design. It gets the most energy out of the essential oil with minimal energy consumption. One kWh of electricity can drive iWhale continuously for as long as 220 hours. Let iWhale take care of you, your loved ones and our earth.

 

           

If you're ever stood in front of a majestic waterfall or walked outside right after a rain storm, then you've experienced the exhilaration and rush of positive energy and overall well-being. The secret lies in the high density of negative ions in the air. iWhale releases rich negative ions into your interior spaces to create the same sensation. It enriches the air to combat pollution, allergens, odors and dust.

Smooth and delicate, exquisite and durable, iWhale is definitely a gift of love in this holiday season! Let iWhale bring good night sleeps and radiant mornings to you! Whether you want a holiday gift for your loved ones or even for yourself, iWhale is a great choice. Delivering in February, iWhale is a sweet and warm gift for Valentine's Day! 

 

 

Designed by a Red Dot Award winner from Great Britain, iWhale is constructed using state-of-the-art procedures that ensure exceptional durability and pleasing aesthetics. With smooth curves and a modern, streamlined design, the iWhale will become your favorite artistic home decoration!

 

The cleanness of water directly influences the quality of aroma mist. With the power of gravity, the spherical shape sets iWhale free from scale deposit. Enjoy fresher aroma, fresher air, and better sleep with iWhale!

New Level-Up Capacitive Water Detection -- Improve water purity from the origin.

  

 

Electromagnetic radiation from household products can have a negative effect on our health, including our sleep patterns. iWhale's 4.5W/5V low-energy consumption design releases minimal electro-magnetic radiation, making it safe to use around children and pregnant women. Only 1 kWh of electricity can drive iWhale continuously for as long as 220 hours. Operating at only a 5dB noise level, iWhale is super quiet and safe to use for children and pregnant women. You can place it bedside or anywhere in your house and feel at ease.

 

iWhale is super light and fits in the palm of your hand. It’s portable, so you can take it anywhere. You can experience iWhale's soothing benefits instantly by simply plugging it into a USB port on your smartphone, laptop or portable battery. No extra adapters or apps are needed. Bring it with you when you travel to enjoy a peaceful night's sleep anywhere. Let iWhale give you a soothing spa treatment anywhere, anytime!

 

The iWhale also features a night light that emits a soft blue light at an acceptable brightness, so it doesn't interfere with your ability to fall asleep fast. Moreover, it conveniently reminds you to refill the water reservoir by gently flashing the night light before it enters auto shut-off mode.

 

 

 

 

 

Our new iWhale design, the limited-edition British style version, requires seven complicated procedures of manual paint spraying. We had spent long days and nights on the new design, and we are so excited and proud with the amazing results. The time-consuming and intricate production requires strong financial support, and we would never make it without your trust and support. Your contributions mean a lot to us. Please help us get closer to our dream and inspire people to make a difference in their lives!

 

iWhale Ltd. is a UK- based startup located in Clerkenwell in Greater London, which is the UK’s most flourishing design community. Our mission is to build a creative environment where people can achieve happiness in the most natural way, yet get great satisfaction using modern technology that simplifies their lives.  We “iWhale” bring you a healthy and joyful lifestyle!

 

1. When will you deliver iWhales?

The estimated delivery of iWhales will be in February 2017. It will be a perfect gift on Valentine's Day. 

2. Can I get a refund after I receive iWhale?

Yes. We are confident that you will love iWhale. If not, please send it back within 14 days and we will fully refund you. Because we cooperate with the factory in China, you will be asked to send the iWhale to China. As a startup, we are crowdfunding with low prices. In this case, you need to pay the delivery fee (round trip). Thank you for understanding!

3. How to add water to iWhale? 

Please use the leaf-shaped measurement cup to add water to the tail. Please fully open the cup to add water. One leaf-shaped cup of water is 100ml. If the cup is not fully open, you can add two leaf-shaped cups of water. Do not add water directly with tap water; do not add water to air intake.

4. What should I do if iWhale's nightlight flashes?

It indicates that the water level is low. The auto cut-off system will turn off iWhale when it runs out of water. In this case, you should drain the water off from iWhale and add water slowly to the tail while the blue light is on. Please notice that adding too much water may cause malfunction. 

5. Does iWhale leak water?

No. IWhale doesn’t leak water if you operate it in the correct order of steps. If you add too much water and shake iWhale, it will probably get the unwanted water out as a reminder. Please refer to the answer to question 3 for instructions for the next step.

6. Do I need to change the water when the iWhale is not in use? 

Yes. To avoid bacteria, please wipe iWhale with alcohol, wash it with water, and refill fresh water anytime you use iWhale. When iWhale is no longer needed, please pour out the water.

7. What should I know when I add essential oil? 

Please use 100% natural extracted essential oil instead of artificial essential oil. Add 1-2 drops of essential oil (0.1-0.2 ml) in every 100ml water. Please add essential oil after you add water. If you add too much essential oil or add essential oil without water in iWhale, it may cause malfunctions.

8. How to clean and take care of iWhale? 

If you found any stains in the air intake, please clean it with neutral detergent before use. We suggest you to wipe it with alcohol and wash it with fresh water.

9. How can I remove the previous scent when I add another essential oil? 

If you can smell the remaining scent when you would like to add another essential oil, please refer to the answer of Question 6 and Question 8 (clean and take care of iWhale) to clean it.

10. Does iWhale spray cool or warm mist?

Generally the mist is cool because of cool water. It could be warm if you add warm water. For maximum healthful benefits, please do not use hot water.

11. Is there any situation in which iWhale has problem in spraying mist?

If your iWhale can’t spray mist, or the mist is too little/unstable, it might be because you added too much water, or the USB connection is not stable. Please feel free to contact us at anytime when you have questions or problems. We will get back to you as soon as possible. Our email is: service@iwhale.co.uk.

12. Is there any noise when iWhale is working? 

No. The noise level is less than 5 db and you will not hear it.

13. How long will iWhale turn off automatically?

It will turn off after around 5 hours of continuous work. After 4 hours, the mist will start to get weaker.

story:
TWIST, introducing the world’s finest cyber pleasure toy. Crafted to deliver the most intimate arousal with or without the web connectivity. User can choose to ride it solo or going to the next level with our brilliantly designed cyber pleasure platform community - LovePalz Club.

Here in LovePalz, we firmly believe the boundary between real world and virtual world is disappearing; yet the pleasure, the excitement and the intimate arousal has no limit. 

LovePalz was established in 2012, focus on making interactive sex more engaging, trigger your senses more than just the traditional way, thus constructing an immersive experience. Firstly with the release of Zeus and Hera, a pair of sex toys designed for long distance lovemaking. Each contains an air pump which replicates the movement and pressure applied by the other partner to give users a “realistic representation of intercourse”. By 2014, we began to start constructing our next line of interactive sex toy. 

With the experience on making our first line of product. We’ve gathered all feedbacks and suggestions to sharpen up our idea and start forming what would ultimately improve how loves connect. 

TWIST is essentially a well rounded updated version of ZEUS/HERA. Both male and female versions of TWIST are build as a replica of both gender's nether regions and aim to simulate real physical interaction to enhance maximum sexual wellness. 


Here by proudly present our new line of interactive sex toy- TWIST



Dual Purpose：

You could play for solo use, or you could have fun with someone else on the internet

State of the art design：

Collectible grade, elegant art piece shape

Ergonomics Engineering：

Carefully crafted to be comfortably hold in your palm

Hygienic Materials：

Humanlike soft touch high-end silicone

Powerful performance yet pin-drop silence mechanism plus embedded with 8 vibration patterns


TWIST for Men

Materials: 

1. High impact resistance ABS + PC

2. Thermoplastic Rubber (TPR)

Size: 230 x 85 x 70mm 

Weight: 660 grams

Power source: 4 AAA batteries

Power consumption: up to 3 hours

BLE 4.0 support: iOS 7.0 & Android 4.3 or above

Interface: 3 button interface dial, 8 vibration patterns, 5 adjustable intensity

Long Lasting Power：Up to 3 hours of continues intense pleasure 


TWIST for Women

Materials: 

1. High impact resistance ABS + PC

2. FDA approved silicone

Size: 180 x 40 x 40mm

Weight: 90 grams

Power source: 4 AAA batteries

Power consumption: up to 4 hours

BLE 4.0 support: iOS 7.0 & Android 4.3 or above

Interface: 3 button interface dial, 8 vibration patterns, 5 adjustable intensity

Long Lasting Power：Up to 4 hours of continues intense pleasure 



Starting with the idea to reinvent social networking, we believe that general public nowadays are grown out of or gradually unsatisfied with what mainstream social networking site has to offer.

Thus we’ve created a social service for everyone to step in. People can recreate social activities with the ability to use traditional or video chatting on our club. And we didn’t stop there, we bring the interaction one step further.

One of the biggest milestone we've achieved is to allow users to give command to their partner's TWIST using the button right from your own TWIST. Combine with our LovePalz Club social networking function, our users will get to experience a new era of cyber physical interaction services.

LovePalz Club is in finalized phase and will launch alongside with TWIST. 


It may seems like we've done most of the works, which is true. But there are still minor obstacle needs to be conquer first. We've already finalized the design and mechanism with the packaging and so on and we've already produced our first patch of finished product. As for this very moment, we need to gather all the resources to start the molding process for the mass production. We can always appreciate more positive energy coming our way to making sure the journey we all share can be a smooth sail.


- Earlier prototype and sketches 



Can we use TWIST on our mobile devices?

- It’s completely user friendly if one choose to ride it solo, but you will need a mobile device and a computer with internet to establish the connection. 

What OS do you support?

- Software supports both iOS and Android. Hardware are more of a handy device. 

Does it support Wifi or Bluetooth?

- TWIST comes equip with the latest bluetooth technology to ensure the connection is solid as rock

How do it set it up, is it difficult?

- Nothing is difficult to achieve with our TWIST, you will receive a detailed instruction upon the arrival of your toy.

Do I need to be LovePalz account to use the products?

- To pair up between TWISTs, one needs to register on LovePalz Club and link it with your desire partner.

When do we expect to received the item after purchase?

- The delivery date is set to be toward at the end of January 2015. 

Do you have a retail store that i can buy your products?

- Not yet, but with your help on Indiegogo, we just might. 

Can I throw it into water?

- Yes on the female one. But the male one is only water repellent. 

How to connect TWISTs using LovePalz Club?

- He or she will signup first, create his or her account, edit his or her profile and upload their desire pictures. Then he or she can browse through the lists of members that are reside in LovePalz Club and select their favorite one and begin chatting and hoping to get what they want. 

Do you have warranty?

- When used as intended, we grant a 12-month warranty from the date of purchase for the material and manufacturing defects. Find the detailed warranty description at www.lovepalz.com
